Sani rei oyo ia makahaie rei iaunutu hanai atue poe upui Abraham karai pusu no monne, samatoro isopa sani upui iaisosiki rei.

Isopa pusi oyo, inana upui ne unta hata hutusa. (Unta mo, makapana wani nene totu unie nene pupua sonota.) Irori unta rai runa upui ne apia waron iaka umau sani api hunahana. Iapusaare roe unta nene totu unia na rarorire. Inana pusire, samatoro ihitio ieu na pan niane wani Nahor iruei tanui pan otoe Mesopotamia.
Hoka pan oyo, ikanihoo ne unta rai na raranahaso mai parike nusue mai niane muie. Tea mo, ranie manne nea. Ranie manne mo, sio pinau mai niane rei osaka oeu oripa tihu poe parike rei.

Reiso Abraham ne ia makahaie rei iainisi, “Upuku Anahatana. Ano wani upuku Abraham iainisi iainaa runaya. Uainisi arihonia na akahaiku na usupu ia pina hehuke isa osi upuku anai hanaie. Akahai upuku Abraham na auna anai hanaie iausahai.
Au wani uhaineke parike nusue reini. Potuina tewa oi, mka sio pina hehuka mai niane reini ohokaso mai, oripa tihu.

Reiso uainisi arihonia na ia iki pina hehu seia man wain mka uainisi tihu arihoniki na uninu, reiso mka irati ne tihu na uninu. Sani irati ne tihu rei no uninu, ouo sani iahata, ‘Me unta raino mka uunare raninu oi.’ Na uanei ata ano aroma ia pina hehuke rei osi me manorine Isak. Unoo san rei, areimo mka uanei ata anom iake runa upuku Abraham.”

Iainisi pusi tewasi oimo, sira tau ia iki pina hehu iake tunne isa ihokai. Ianei isoulaha tewasi. Nanai Ribka. Ia mo, Betuel anai pina. Momoi onate tau Nahor, momoi pina onate tau Milka. Nahor mo, Abraham kakai. Ihokai nanie iripa tihu poe parike rei. Iasaoa ne tihu huie. Ihokai poe oyo, iaiinu ne tihu huie rei tau tihu. Oyo on poe nanie inuniki.

Iainisi pusi tewasi oimo, sira tau ia iki pina hehu iake tunne isa ihokai. Ianei isoulaha tewasi. Nanai Ribka. Ia mo, Betuel anai pina. Momoi onate tau Nahor, momoi pina onate tau Milka. Nahor mo, Abraham kakai. Ihokai nanie iripa tihu poe parike rei. Iasaoa ne tihu huie. Ihokai poe oyo, iaiinu ne tihu huie rei tau tihu. Oyo on poe nanie inuniki.
Ne Abraham ne ia makahaie rei iruma na mai ihainekei. Iahata, “Ina. Akahaiku ee! Na uninu tihu noi me tihu huie reino ee.”
Iahata, “Mai, na aninu upu.”
Oyo irati ne tihu rei sisaa arihoni manai. Poe oyo, iuna ia onate rei ininu.
Ininu suka oyo ia pina hehuke rei iahata, “Upu. Mka uripa tihu osi me unta rai oi. Na me makapanau raninu rotu-tu tiaya pokona. Tea mo, ano kasaya oi, tea!”
Reiso isuhu tihu tau unta nene tihu naniaya sisaa na raninu. Ita iruma poe, iripa tihu honu. Inina na tihu panesi na iunare raninu rotu-tu ramkona honu.
Ieu inuni nana iripa tihu, ne Abraham ne ia makahaie rei iari-ariniiki rotu-tu ianamana sae isa tewa oi. Iariniiki na ianei ata kani Anahatana iakahaiki na isupu Isak sahai te tewa.

Unta rai raninu pusi oyo, Abraham ne ia makahaie rei ihoka hunahana waron hunonia mainaya waron sio pinau tau ia ne naene oausahure. Ihoka sapauu iausahui roe ia pina hehuke rei okoi. Sapauu rei mtinte haineke gram 6. Ihoka nitianaya ua waron mtinta gram 114.
Oyo iahata, “Masi asima ee. Ano mo, amam tau ia seia? Mo naniake huie isa waria mo numa te tewa na anekema tanui?”
Iahata, “Upu. Au mo, Betuel anai. Betuel mo, Nahor runa Milka no hehuke.
Ria mani numa naniake huie waria, upu. Monota waron kaimenna osi makapanau iae warora oi.”
Iatinu san rei oyo, irike tune iainisi iainaa runa Anahatana.

Iahata, “Upuku Anahatana uainaa runaya. Ano mo, ano Anahatana wani upuku Abraham iainaa runaya. Ano arihoni tewa auna iake osi upuku Abraham. Ano arime kuru-kuru me anamanaya. Au reini mo, ano akata runaku rotu-tu uhokaku mai upuku Abraham ne mansiau reini.”
Taa san rei oyo, ia iki pina hehuke rei irumai inuniki ria inai ne numa. Hoka ria oyo iruni osi ne mansia mainaya.

Ribka hotai isa nanai Laban. Iatinu hotai iruni runa Abraham ne ia makahaie rei samatoro inoo sapauu roe hotai okoi runa nitianaya poe hanai atue. Inoo san rei oyo, iruma poe, inoo. Hoka poe oyo, inoo Abraham ne ia makahaie rei waipo iooi runa ne unta poe parike rei nusue asi.

Ribka hotai isa nanai Laban. Iatinu hotai iruni runa Abraham ne ia makahaie rei samatoro inoo sapauu roe hotai okoi runa nitianaya poe hanai atue. Inoo san rei oyo, iruma poe, inoo. Hoka poe oyo, inoo Abraham ne ia makahaie rei waipo iooi runa ne unta poe parike rei nusue asi.
Oyo iahata, “Upu. Ano mo, Anahatana irui iake osia. Reiso pene aruea mai mui reini. Mai na ieuta ria numa. Ami aseka tau naniam nea. Me unta iae, aseka tau naniaya oi.”

Reiso ia makahaie rei ipusui. Uaso onususo ria numa. Laban iaisosi ne sio makahaia orati unta nene apia, oyo orui mono kaimenna osi makapanau rai raai. Orui monota osi ne makapanau rai ne orui tihu osi ia makahaie rei runa ne mansiau. Orui tihu osiso nanie osohu aio atua.
Taa san rei oyo, orata muaina. Ne sira tau Abraham ne makahaie rei iasau san rei, “Napa mkane ee. Usima runa we anamanae reini ee, samatoro iaita.”
Laban iahata, “Reiso anamana roe, upu.”
Oyo iahata, “Au reini mo, Abraham ne ia makahaie.

Anahatana irui iake mainae osi upuku Abraham. Irui iake mainae osiki reiso ne kaya. Irui ne rompau, ne koropou, ne unta, runa ne keledaiu. Irui ne hunahana runa ne perak. Irui ne sio pina makahaia runa sio hanai makahaia.
Samatoro sahai Sara isusu ia iki hanaie isa. Aikee sae mo, ikore-korei iamtuai nea. Upuku Abraham irui ne numa hutae pusiki osi anai hanaie rei.
Iaisosiku usopa. Iahata, ‘Pene anini ia pina hehu Kanaan isa oi osi anaku hanaie. Pene iausahai mai otoe Kanaan wani irueta reini.’
Iaisosiku ueuku mai amai ne numa, mai ne mansiau na unina ia pina hehuke isa osi anai hanaie.
Oyo uasei, ‘Sani ia iki pina hehuke rei ipenei ieu ikataku suru mai mo, sapan?’

Oyo iahata, ‘Anahatana wain upusui na ukata ne anamanaya mka iaisosi ne maisosie on roe noiyaha na ikataya. Ikataya na iakahaia tau me arena reini na asupu ia iki pina hehuke isa osi anaku. Mka asupui pan ruaku we mansiau pan amaku ne numa.
Ne sani ia iki pina rei runa ne mansiau openeso mo, mka mamsopae rei eresupua tewa.’

Ne sinasi uhokaku poe parike rei nusue oyo uainisi pan anoku. Uahata, ‘Upuku Anahatana. Ano sahoro upuku Abraham iainisi iainaa runaya. Reiso Upu, uainisi arihonia na akahaiku runa we arena reini na usupu ia iki pina hehuke isa.

Reiso akahaiku na uooku mai parike rei nusue sui osa. Na sani ia iki pina hehuke isa ihokai iripa tihu oyo uainisi tihu arihoniki na uninu.’ Uahata, ‘Masi akahaiku na uninu mkane arihoni me tihu reino ee.’
Oyo sani iamanaku, iahata, ‘E-e. Mai na aninu, upu. Runa me unta rai raninu oi.’ Samatoro au uanei ata ia iki pina reimo, Anahatana ruai ininiki osi upuku Abraham anai hanaie.
Uainisi pan anoku suka tewasi oyo, sira tau Ribka ihokai. Iasaoa ne tihu huie nanie iripa tihu poe parike. Iripa ne tihu suka oyo, uahata, ‘Ina. Akahaiku ee, na uninu arihoni me tihu reino ee.’
Oyo ia iki pina rei irati ne tihu arihoni manai sisaa oyo iahata, ‘Upu, mai na aninu. Runa me unta rai iae mka au unare raninu oi.’ Reiso uninu. Oyo iuna we unta rai raninu oi.
Raninu suka oyo uasei, ‘Amamu tau ia seia?’
Iahata, ‘Amaku tau Betuel, Nahor runa Milka no hehuke hanaie.’ Uatinu san rei oyo, uhoka sapauu oyo uausahui roe okoi, nitianae unue, unusui tau hanai.

Reiso rike tune uainisi uainaa runa Anahatana. Anahatana wain upuku Abraham iainisi iainaa runai. Uahata, ‘Upuku Anahatana. Ano mo, ano iake nai osa. Ano akahaiku rotu-tu uhokaku mai rei. Uhokaku mai upuku Abraham ne mansiau. Reiso uhokaku mai, usupu ia iki pina hehuke rei arihoni ne mansiau osi anai hanaie. Usupu kakai momoi.’

Reiso ranie hatae reini sani mo maue na anomo runa upuku Abraham, areimo oamanaku orui mo hehuke pina osi upuku anai hanaie, areimo oasau. Sani mo maue oruiki te, tewa te. Hete sae, oasau osiku mai na uanei ia-ia ata nanie una sae.”
Laban runa Betuel oahata, “Upu. Ami asau sae isa tewa oi tau anamanae reimo arihoni Anahatana. Reiso ami anei tewa ata nanie asau sae.
Ne mai. Ribka ia reini. Ananai niu na ieu ikataya. Ikataya, na ria inana upumu Abraham anai tau sahai sani Anahatana ruai iasau rei.”
Ia makahaie rei iatinu san rei oyo irike tune iainaa runa Anahatana.
Irike tune samatoro ihoka apia runa hunahana na perak. Ihoka pusire oyo iruire osi Ribka. Irui apia umau osi Ribka hotai runa inai oi. Irui apia waron hunonia mainaya.
Taa san rei oyo ia makahaie rei runa ne mansiau oaiso. Oaiso suka oyo, onekeso noi Ribka sio. Onekeso onone hatae.
Nene hanu omnanoe oyo ia makahaie rei iahata, “Upu. Tapiku na ununiku poe upuku Abraham nea.”
Oyo Ribka hotai runa inai oahata, “Ribka iruei ikatama onona hutusa te minggu unue isa ee. Samatoro ieui.”
Ne iahata, “Pene osopo onetema nea. Ne Anahatana iakahaiku reiso rotu-tu usupu Isak sahai. Reiso otapima na anunima poe upuku nea.”
Oahata, “Reiso mai na ioi Ribka na iasei tanui ee.”
Reiso ooiki oyo oasei tanui. “Me maue na apusu sio reini te tewa?”
Iahata, “E-e. Iake.”
Reiso otapi Ribka runa ne ia pina mampakananae oeuso runa Abraham ne makahaie rei runa ne mansiau.
Oainisi na Anahatana irui iake osiki. Oasau oahata,
“Ami ainisi na asusu haha panesi
rotu-tu mea upu momou sio nihun nanan.
Mea upu momou rei
mka oheta tau no nisau.”
Reiso Ribka runa ne sio makahaia rei oseka tau no apia. Oyo osaaso roe unta. Osaa roe oyo, oeuso okata Abraham ne makahaie runa ne mansiau rei.
Tau Abraham ne makahaie ieui pan Laban sio mo, Isak ipaki ne apia ieui poe parike wani nanae Lahai-Roi. Lahai-Roi nene manariti, “Ia inoo au sui osa.” Iruei mai Kanaan on poe hae.
Taue isa tau ranie manne ihokai iarinii roe ne nisi anoe. Ne ihetu unui, isira tau inoo unta umau waron hainau asi.
Unta raimo, Abraham ne makahaie runa ne mansiau. Ribka iae ihetu unui, inoo Isak. Oyo isipui arihoni ne unta rei.
Iasei arihoni Abraham ne makahaie rei. Iahata, “Ia hanai seia wain on poe ieui imetata reini?”
Iahata, “Au upuku Isak.” Reiso Ribka inete uai anoe tau hana-hana.
Hoka mai oyo, ia makahaie rei iruni osi Isak runa sapani na isupu Ribka osiki nanie tau sahai rei.

Reiso Isak inusu irori Ribka pan numa anoe. Pani inai ne numa wani sio onanai arihoni makapana unta. Oyo inanai tau sahai. Isak anoi runai. Anoi runai reiso anoi mirike nai osa, anoi repunoko inai tewa nea.
Abraham iausahai honu. Sahai honue reimo nanai Ketura.
Isusu ne hehuka hanaia wason nanao: Simran, Yoksan, Medan, Midian, Isybak runa Suah.
Yoksan isusu ne hehuka wason nanao Syeba runa Dedan. Dedan nea upu sahoro muie reini oaoiso tau sio Asyur, sio Letus runa sio Leum.
Midia ne hehuka tau: Efa, Efer, Henokh, Abida runa Eldaa. Sio rei pusiso noa upu tau Ketura.
Masike Abraham irui Isak ne kawasa tau numa anoe rusun aikuna
tau wain ikarihuru iamahai asi iae, isaka iru-rui apia runa muaina osi Isak nea waniu rei oi. Oyo iaisosiso orue hainau arihoni Isak. Orue ria otoe Kanaan on ria hae.
Abraham ikore-korei iamtuai nea oyo imatai. Imatai tau ne musum utuni hutu itu rahana nima.
Abraham ikore-korei iamtuai nea oyo imatai. Imatai tau ne musum utuni hutu itu rahana nima.

Imatai oyo Isak runa Ishmael uaso oautotui, oaunutui pan hatu nohue wani nanae Makhpela. Hatu nohue wani haineke nia Mamre on ria hae. Wani mai nisi anoe wani Abraham ihane arihoni Efrom. Efrom mo, Sohar anai, ia Het rei. Abraham ihanei na iaunutu sahai Sara tanui. Reiso oeu oaunutu Abraham tanui na ikata sahai oi.

Imatai oyo Isak runa Ishmael uaso oautotui, oaunutui pan hatu nohue wani nanae Makhpela. Hatu nohue wani haineke nia Mamre on ria hae. Wani mai nisi anoe wani Abraham ihane arihoni Efrom. Efrom mo, Sohar anai, ia Het rei. Abraham ihanei na iaunutu sahai Sara tanui. Reiso oeu oaunutu Abraham tanui na ikata sahai oi.
Abraham imatai, oyo Anahatana irui iake osi Isak. Tau rei Isak iruei haineke parike wani nanae Lahai-Roi asi. Lahai-Roi nene manariti “Ia inoo au sui osa”.
Ismael mo, Abraham anai. Inai tau Hagar, ia pina Mesir rei. Sara ne makahaie.
Ismael ne hehuka wason nanao:
Sio hutusa rahana ua sahoro ouna numa upua tau ipana hutusa rahana ua. No niana mo, ohetere pusu nanao.
Ismael ne musum utuni hutu tonu rahana itu oyo imatai.
Nea upu momou orueso sui otoa on poe Syur rotu-tu ohoka pan Hawila. Syur mo, wapo Mesir on ria hae, ria arena wani nanie ereeui ria Asyur. Orueso hainau arihoni Abraham nea upu momou umau honu.
Areini sou monae rerihoni Isak. Isak mo, amai tau Abraham.
Isak ne musum hutu ate samatoro inana Ribka. Ribka mo, Laban hotai. Noa ama tau Betuel. Betuel mo, upui tau Aram. Sio mo, arihoni otoe Mesopotamia.

Onana umau potuina nea ne Ribka isusu tewasi. Isusu tewasi reiso Isak iainisi osi sahai arihoni Upuri Anahatana. Oyo Upuri Anahatana irui sae wani Isak iainisiki rei. Reiso sira tau Ribka tinain taua.

Ribka iahana sani sio ikina ua nisu-nisuo pan tiai anoe reiso iasau pan anoi, “Ira oe! Sapan na sio ikina ua reini nisu-nisuo oakarema umau pan tiaku anoe reini omi?” Reiso iainisi tau Upuri Anahatana san rei, “Upuku Anahatana. Sapan na sio ikina ua reini nisu-nisuo na oakarema umau mai tiaku anoe reini?”
Reiso Upuri Anahatana isima osiki iahata,
“Niana ua waromo tiamu anoe reino tea!
Ano mka arue runa niana ua waron mka oahita runa umau.
Ia isa mka iamkona erenesi ia isa.
Ia manaonete mka ianori runa ia muie.”
Taa ne hunana mtuaya oyo, iruei runa sio iki alalekau. Sio ikina ua rei, sio iki hanaia.
Ia wain iheta manahane ianaone mo, ia msinae, samatoro ne hunua noo sani papite wani nene hunua panesi rei. Reiso ohete nanai tau Esau. Esau mo, nene manariti, “Hunua.”

Ita ia muie honu. Ne hanai atue wanane rekahuu kakai toui. Reiso ohete nanai tau Yakup. (Yakup nene manariti iakahuu toui. Iakahuu toui, areimo rekakina ata ia mo, mka iakarota.) Uaso oamrae pannuhu Isak ne musum hutu nome nea.
Esau runa Yakup sio mainaya nea. Esau ianei iakaohu. Reiso ia ne suka ieu inekei noi wesie. Ne Yakup mo, ia menene. Ia ne suka iruei mai numa man. No numa wani onanai arihoni makapana unte.
Reiso Isak anoi runa Esau. Tea mo, ia ne suka iai peniu waron Esau ihunure. Ne Ribka mo, anoi runa Yakup.
Tau ranie hatae isa Yakup wain irie sanau kihue msinae. Waini irie sanaute oyo sira tau Esau ihokai on ria wesie. Imata muaine.
Reiso Esau iasau osi Yakup san rei, “Rui we sanau kihue msinae reino mkane mai. Tea mo, wani umata muaine nea reini!” Reiso ohete nanai tau Edom. (Edom atinui sani “Msinae” tau sou Ibrani.)
Yakup iahata, “Iake. Mka urui osia sirinia. Hete sae arui me kawasa manaonete rei na urime numa hutae, ipane taue pusiki.”
Iahata, “Iake. Nanie umata muaine nea reini! Umataku mka una sae runa we kawasa rei?”
Iahata, “Reiso asopa osiku ee. Samatoro mka urui sanaute reini osia.”
Oyo Esau isopa mai Yakup uai anoe. Iahata, “Iake. Urui we kawasa manaonete osia nea. Hete sae uai sanau kihue msinae reino.”
Reiso iahen ne kawasa manaonete rei osi wanin Yakup.
Oyo Yakup irui poroti runa sanau kihue msinae osi Esau. Esau iaiki rotu-tu tiai pokone samatoro ihitioi ieui. Tau san rei Esau ipenei tau ne kawasa manaonete rei.

Poe otoe Kanaan reimo muaina tewa sani naone Abraham iamahaiki asi rei. Muaina tewa reiso Isak sio ohitio oeuso na poe nia Gerar. Hoka poe oyo, iainisi arihoni Abimelekh ia ona aia Pilistin na orueso poe rei.
Ieu poe Gerar. Tea mo, Upuri iatuhete ruai osiki nea, iasau san rei. Iahata, “Pene aeua poe otoe Mesir nea. Aruea pan otoe wani mka uasau osia reini.

Aruea mai otoe reini mkane ee. Mka ukatamo na urui iake osimo sui osa. Otoe Kanaan reini pusiki mka uruiki osia. Uruiki osia runa mea upu momou pusiso utuso. Mka urui sae waron utotoe osi amam Abraham rei.
Mka urui mea upu momou panesi nooi sani oneu roe nante. Au mka urui otoe reini osiso oi. Mka urui iake osi sio niana pusiso pusu upumu isa.
Mka urui iake osimo. Tau Abraham iatinu tanuku. Ipusu we maunauna pusire uture.”
Reiso Isak iruei poe Gerar.
Orueso poe nia Gerar oyo sio onoo Ribka mo, ia iake. Oasei tau Isak san rei, “Ribka mo, hotamu te saham?”
Isak iausau iahata, “Ia mo, sahaku tewa ne hotaku.” Tea mo, Isak ikaitau sio poe niane rei mka ohunui sani iasau ata sahai. Tau Ribka mo, nooi ia iake nai osa.
Isak iruei poe nia Gerar nea. Ranie hatae isa ia ona aia inoo pusu yanela. Inoo Isak iasa-asamau Ribka.
Reiso ioi Isak na iasei tanui, “Ia pina reimo titie saham te hotamu?”
Iahata, “Ia pina rei, sahaku. Sani sinana uasau uahata, ‘Sahaku’ mka ohunuku reiso uasau uahata, ‘Hotaku’ rei tea.”
Iahata, “Ano auna sae tanuma reini? Sinana we sio iki hanaia mai niane reini oneke okatai sapan? Reiso pene apasanama. Tea mo, ruam asana.”
Taa san rei oyo, iasau osi ne sio iki hanaia poe niane hahae rei. Iahata, “Sani ia isa mai niane reini iakarema ia hanaie reini te, isoulaha ia pina reini te, mka imatai.”

Reiso Isak iruei poe niane rei. Iruei poe niane rei oyo inana ne tanei apia, irahu ne nisi. Irahu ne nisi rei, Upuri irui iake osiki reiso isupu muaina panesi. Sani irahu atuhu anae osa man ne isupu ne atuhu utuni.
Isupu ne atuhu panesi reiso ne kaya.
Ne manianeu panesi. Ne rompau ne une-uneu panesi. Ne koropou panesi. Reiso sio Pilistin oananai.
Oananai reiso osou no parikeu tau tapune. Parikeu raimo, amai Abraham ne manianeu okanire on Abraham iamahai asi.
Taa ia ona aia iatinu san rei oyo, ioi Isak. Isak ihoka mai oyo, ia aia iasau san rei, “Aeu arihoni mani otoe reini nea. Tea mo, ano me kawasa anesi ami nea.”
Reiso Isak sio ohitio oeuso rotu-tu ohokaso poe watane Gerar. Hoka poe samatoro oapuoo no wanane wani sio ounai arihoni makapana unta. Oapuooi pusi oyo orueso poe rei.

Sio okani parikeu umau honu. Parikeu rai iae, sio Pilistin sahoro osoure tau tapune. Parikeu raimo Abraham ne manianeu okanire on Abraham iamahai asi. Imatai oyo sio Pilistin osoure. Parikeu rai Isak ihete nanaya sani amai naone ihete nanaya rai.
Isak ne manianeu okani parike poe Watane Gerar, osupu tihu panesi.
Ne sio mamsaka rompau on poe Gerar oatana runa Isak ne sio mamsaka rompau. Oahata, “Waene reini mo, ami mani waene.” Reiso Isak ihete parike rei nanae Esek wani nene manariti “Atana Runa Umau.”
Ita Isak ne manianeu okani parike isa honu. Ne oatana runa umau sinia. Reiso Isak ihete parike rei nanae Sitna wani nene manariti “Nisa.”

Ita oeuso arihoni rei, oyo okani parike isa honu. Parikeu tonu nea. Parike isa reini honu mo, oatana runa umau tewa nea. Reiso Isak ihete nanae Rehobat wani nene manariti “Tuamana Ralai.” Reiso Isak iahata, “Upuri irui iake osita na irueta mai otoe reini. Mka ita panesi iuna kaya mai niane reini.”
Ita Isak ieui honu, ihokai pan nia Bersyeba.

Tau mono rei Upuri iatuhete ruai osiki. Iahata, “Au mo, au Anahatana wain amam iainisi iainaa runaku. Pene akaitau. Au mka ukata runaya. Urui iaka osia. Mka mea upu momou panesi sani sae wani utotoe osi amam rei.”
Oyo Isak irane hatu noore sani anau samatoro iainisi iainaa runa Upuri. Oyo iapuoo ne wanane pan otoe rei. Ne wanane rei mo, ounai arihoni makapana unta. Ita ne manianeu okani parike isa honu.
Taue isa ia ona aia Abimelekh on poe nia Gerar ihokai pan Isak. Ihokai ikata Ahusat runa Pikhol. Ahusat mo, isaka iau-aunaui. Pikhol mo, isaka iai-aisosi sio tentara.
Ohokaso pan, oyo Isak iasei tanso, “Ohokamo mai tanuku muie reini nanie taa hae? Aikee naone mo, openemo tanuku rei. Rotu-tu oneiku arihoni mo niane rei, tea!”
Abimelekh iahata, “Ama. Muie reini mo, ami mato anei ata Upuri ikata runaya. Reiso ami nanie aeuma mai tanua na asau osia na uata isopa. Uata isopa

na pene omi ouna kahatene tanuma. Nooi sani ami iae auna kahatene tanumo tewa rei. Auna iake runamo reiso atapimo oeumo anori kaia runa umau. Auna kahatene isa tanumo tewa. Reiso ami anei ata Upuri Anahatana ikata runaya. Irui iake osia.”
Oanamana pusi oyo, Isak iaisosi ne manianeu onana muaine oyo oaiso.
Nene hanu omnanoe wapan ereputi-puti asi oimo, uaso ototoe osopa nea. Osopa pusi oyo, Isak iahaaso, “Eu noi. Oeu ainati rotu-tu ohokamo poe mo niane.” Oyo Abimelekh sio onuniso.
Tau ranie hatae rei, Isak ne manianeu ohokaso tanui osima osiki. Oahata, “Ami akani parike isa honu. Asupu nene tihu panesi.”
Reiso Isak ihete nanae tau Syeba. Nene manariti mo,
. Reiso niane rei nanae san rei rotu-tu reini. Nanae Bersyeba.
Esau ne musum hutu ate, oyo iausahai inana sio pinau ua arihoni sio Het. Ia isa nanai Yudit. Amai tau Beeri. Ia isa nanai Basmat. Amai tau Elon.
Sio pinau ua rei no haliu iaka tewa. Reiso Esau inai Ribkha runa amai Isak oatamisi no pina msahana rei.
Isak ikore-korei iamtuai. Matai usena raputiso nea. Reiso taue isa ioi Esau, anai hanaie manaonete. Iahata, “Esau.”
Esau isana, “Oe, ama.”
Iahata, “Ano anei ata wani uamtuaku nea, tea! Reiso mka ukarihuru uamahai potuina tewa nea.
Reiso anana me henua niuna, na aeu akaohu na ahunu peni isa mai osiku.

Aroriki hokaya mai, oyo aapamasai ia-ia pusu sae wani we sukai rei. Roriki mai osiku na uaiki. Tiaku pokone pusi samatoro uainisi arihoni Upuri Anahatana na irui iake osia. Uainisi osia on wani uamkona asi reini.”
Isak runa Esau wason oanamana ne, Ribka iatinu. Reiso taa Esau ihitio ieu iakaohui,
oyo Ribka ioi Yakup. Iahata, “Yakup. Eu mai ee. Na uasau na sae isa reini wani mato uatinui. Amamu mato iasau osi kakamu. Iahata,
‘Aeu na ahunu peni isa osiku mai. Apamasai ia-ia pusu sae wani we sukai rei. Na uaiku tiaku pokone samatoro uainisi arihoni Upuri Anahatana na irui iake osia. Uainisi osia on wani uamkona asi reini.’
Reiso mai na atinu ia-ia runa sae wani nanie uasau osia reini.
Eua pan re makapanau naniaya na anini une-une honua hata ua waron rapokotueso. Aninire na uapamasare ia-ia pusu sae wani amam ne sukai rei.
Na aroriki osiki na iaiki. Iaiki tiai pokone na iainisi na Upuri Anahatana irui iake osia on wain iamkona asi reini.”
Ne Yakup iahata, “Ina, ano anei, tea! Kakaku mo, ne patane hunua panesi. Ne au mo, tewa.

Pene tu-tu amaku iakahuu hanaku atue na iahana ata hanaku atue nene hunua tewa, areimo uakarotai rei, tea! Reiso mka iainisi arihoni Upuri Anahatana na irui iake osiku tewa, ne mka iainisi arihoni Upuri Anahatana na irui kahatene osiku.”
Inai iahata, “Anaku. Pene anom reuponu san rei! Mka au sahoro uhana rosa rei. Reiso eu na anana sae wani uasau osia rei. Eu na anana une-uneu rai mai osiku. Pene anom reuponu.”
Taa san rei oyo, Yakup ieu inana une-uneu rai osi inai. Iseka tau pusire pusi oyo iruire osi inai iapamasare. Iapamasare pusu sae wani amai ne sukai rei.
Iapamasare pusi oyo, inana Esau ne api honua waron iaunuture mai numa anoe rei. Inanare osi Yakup. Oyo iausahure osi Yakup.
Ita inana une-une anae nene unte. Ipakei mai hanai atua runa tionai waron hunua tewa rei.
Ipake pusi Yakup pusi oyo, irui muaina rai runa porotiu waron iunare rai.
Yakup inanare arihoni inai oyo irorire osi amai. Hoka pan amai oyo iahata, “Ama.”
Amai isana, “Oe. Ano mo, ano seia? Ano Esau te, ano Yakup?”

Iahata, “Au mo, au Esau, tea! Anamu manaonete. Ama. Uhunu peni isa, uapamasai pusu sae wani aasau osiku rei. Hanu roe na aruea na ai peni wani uroriki osia reini. Ai pusiki oyo ainisi arihoni Upuri Anahatana na irui iake osiku.”
Iahata, “Asupui supa rapu-rapu man rei, ama?”
Iahata, “Ama. Upumu Anahatana wain ano ainisi ainaa runai iruiki osiku.”
Iahata, “Reiso mai na uakahuua, ata kani titue ano mo, ano Esau?”
Oyo Yakup ieu ihaineke amai. Ihainekei oyo amai akahuui. Iakahuui oyo iahata, “Niomu mo, Yakup nioi. Ne hanam atua mo, hana atu Esau!”
Reiso Isak iationa Yakup tewa tau Yakup hanai atua hunua. Hunua sani Esau. Ne haineke Isak nanie iainisi arihoni Upuri Anahatana na irui iake osiki,
ne iasei honu san rei, “Titue ano mo, ano Esau?”
Iahata, “E-e. Ama. Au reini mo, au Esau, tea sahoro seia?”
Iahata, “Reiso rui peni reino mai na uaiki. Uai pusi oyo uainisi arihoni Upuri Anahatana na irui iake osia.”
Reiso Yakup irui muaina rai runa tihu anggur mkane na ininu.
Iai pusi oyo iahata, “Eu mai hainekeku. Na amukiku mkane.”
Reiso Yakup ieu haineke amai nanie imukiki. Ne amai ioko Esau ne apia haua. Ioko san rei oyo iainisi arihoni Upuri Anahatana na irui iake osiki. Iahata,
“Upuku Anahatana.
Anaku ne apia raini haua iaka.
Haua iaka sani hau nisi
wani ano auna nene atuhu huaya panesi.
Uainisi na arui uane on roe nante.
Auna ne nisiu nene atuhu panesi.
Uainisi na auna ne maneiu runa anggur nene huaya panesi nai osa.
Uainisi na auna niana waisa pusiso ouna manianeu tanui.
Auna sio mai otoa-otoa pusiso ohahue tanui.
Uainisi na auna nea upu momou
no kawasa mainae arihoni wanin nea upu momou.
Auna wanin nea upu momou ohahue tanso.
Uainisi na arui kahatene osi sio wason nanie orui kahatene osiki.
Uainisi na arui iake osi sio wason nanie orui iake osiki.”
Isak iainisi arihoni Upuri Anahatana na irui iake osi Yakup pusi oyo Yakup ihokai arihoni amai. Mata huni tewa oyo Esau ihokai on pan wesie.
Ia iae irie peni rei iake oyo iroriki osi amai. Iahata, “Hanu roe nea ama. Aruea na ai we muaina waron urorire osia reini. Ai na ainisi arihoni Upuri Anahatana na irui iake osiku.”
“Ano seia reini?”
Iahata, “Au ama. Au mo, anamu hanaie manaonete, tea?”

Isak isira reiso ikana-kananunu. Ikananunu oyo iasei, “Ano rei sahoro ia seia wain sinasi irori peni osiku rei? Au uaire nea on anunia tewasi rei! Reiso au uainisi arihoni Upuri Anahatana na irui iake osiki nea. We mainisie reimo, we mainisie nanie haineke umataku. Reiso we mainisie rei osi ruai runa nea upu nea momou rotu-tu ria supan.”
Esau iatinu san rei oyo irani nioi mainae. Irani iatamisi rotu-tu ipesi rau ruai. Oyo iasau, “Ama. Ainisi osi au reini oi. Ama.”
Iahata, “Wanimu sinasi ihokai mai iakarotaku. Uainisi arihoni Upuri Anahatana na irui iake osiki. Aikee nanie uainisi osi ano san rei, ne ia mai inanare nea. Reiso uruire osiki nea.”
Esau iahata, “Areini mo, nai ua nea. Waniku iakarotaku. Reiso nanai pannuhui. Inana we kawasa manaonete nea. Ita inana mainisie wani mka osiku rei. Ama ano me mainisie tamene isa tewa nea?”

Iahata, “Uainisi na iuna mainae inesi ano. Uainisi na nea kakau nea waniu ouna manianeu tanui. Au iae uainisi na Upuri Anahatana iuna ne nisi nene manei huaya panesi, nene anggur huaya panesi. Reiso mka urui sae osia oi, ama?”
Esau iainisi arihoni amai sirinia. Iasei, “Ama. Ano me mainisie osa rei man si? Ainisi na Upuri Anahatana irui iake osi au oi ama!” Iainisi san rei ne irani sirinia.
Reiso amai iasau san rei,
“Uane on roe nante osia tewa.
Me nisiu nene huaya panesi tewa.
Ano mo, mka amahaia ahita runa me nisau man.
Ahita runa me tunue man.
Mka auna maniane tau wanim.
Ne masike san rei iae mka ano ahanamata atinu tanui.
Ano mka arumaya arihoni ne kawasa sani koropou
wani sio okanihoo tionai erenosui
oyo ererumai arihoni upue ne kawasa.”

Reiso Esau ipenei tau wanin nea. Tau sae? Amai iainisi na Upuri Anahatana irui iake osi wanin. Irui osi Esau ruai tewa. Reiso Esau iasau pan anoi san rei, “Potuina tewa nea oyo mka amaku imatai. Imatai oyo anoma rapunokoi. Anoma rapunokoi pusi oyo mka uhunu waniku.”
Ribka iatinu tau anamanae rei oyo iaisosiso na ooi Yakup. Iahata, “Mai na atinu anamanae reini ee. Kakamu ipenei tanua reiso nanie ihunua.
Reiso apusu we anamanae reini. Masi aeua rapu pan hotaku Laban waipan iruei pan nia Haran.
Aruea pan etemu rotu-tu potuina mkane rotu-tu kakamu ne sate rei eremanu

na anoi kanihue runa sae wani aunai tanui rei. Unoo ata kakamu anoi eresaa tewa nea, mka uaisosi sio umau pan, onanaya na anunia mai numa. Upeneku tau unoo we hehuka hanaia uamo omatamo tau ranie hatae osa.”

Reiso Ribka iasau osi sahai san rei, “Uhanamata unoo Esau ne sio pina rakana ua rei. Upeneku tanso. Munata Yakup iausahai mai otoe reini runa ia pina arihoni sio Het isa honu nene iake umataku nai osa.”

Isak iatinu san rei oyo ioi Yakup. Yakup taa iooi mai mitanunue oyo Isak iasau iahata, “Anaku. Mka Upuri Anahatana ikata runaya. Reiso mai na arue na uasau na sae isa reini ee. Pene anana ia iki pina isa arihoni sio Het mai Kanaan reini.
Aeua pan otoe Mesopotamia pan momom Betuel na ausahaya runa etemu anai pina isa.
Uainisi na Anahatana wain ne kawasa erenesi pusire irui iake osi ano runa saham na irui me hehuka mea upu mea momou panesi. Ano mka auna numa upue tau sio niana panesi.

Uainisi na Upuri Anahatana irui iake osia runa mea upu mea momou sani Upuri Anahatana irui iake osi momom Abraham rei. Uainisi na arue mai otoe wani aruea tanui reini wani Anahatana iruiki osi momom Abraham. Otoe reini wani irue tanui reini sani ita rakana mka tuamane reini osi ruari.”
Reiso Isak iaisosi Yakup ieui pan Mesopotamia pan etei, Laban. Laban amai tau Betuel arihoni sio Aram.
Esau iatinu ata amai iainisi na Upuri irui iake osi wanin oyo iaisosiki ieui pan otoe Mesopotamia na inina sahai isa pan rei. Isopoi na pene inana ia pina mai otoe Kanaan.
Esau ianei ata wanin ipusu inai runa amai no maunauna. Ieui pan Mesopotamia nea.
Reiso ianei ata inai runa amai uaso openeso tau sio pina Kanaan rei.
Esau ianei san rei nea oyo, ieui pan oai Ismael. Ismael mo, momoi Abraham anai. Oyo inana oai anai pina isa wain nanai Mahalat, Nebayot hotai. Reiso inana sahai isa honu.
Yakup ieui iarihoni nia Bersyeba nanie ieui pan nia Haran.
Ihokai ria otoe isa mo ranie eremanu-manu nea. Reiso ia inekei ria otoe rei. Inekei inaka unui tau hatu isa.
Ineke munui nai osa oyo inekei iamnii. Ineke iamnii inoo oane isa ereoo poe tuamane rotu-tu erehokai roe nante. Inoo Upuri Anahatana ne sio maisosia on roe noiyaha osipu osaa tau oane rei.

Inoo Upuri Anahatana iooi mai nusui oyo iasau osiki, “Au sahoro Upumu Anahatana wain momom Abraham runa amam Isak oanisi oainaa runaku. Mka urui tuamane wani anekea tanui reini osi mea hehuka, mea upu, mea momou.
Mea upu mka sio panesi sani tapuna waron poe tuamane. Sio mka onana tuamane on ria, on nau, rotu-tu no tuamana panesi. Mka urui iake osi sio niana pusiso pusu ano runa mea upu, mea momou.
Anomu erepeka. Aeua sui supan man, mka ukata runaya nanie usakaya. Mka ununi uroria mai otoe reini. Mka uarihonia tewa. Mka una sae wani utotoe osia reini.”

Oyo Yakup imaranae. Isira reiso iasau pan anoe. Iahata, “Ira oe. Upuku Anahatana wain reini! Waini otoe reini. Ne muie reini samatoro uanei! Otoe reini reasiraku. Areini mo, Anahatana ne numa maa! Areini noiyaha nene mitanunue maa omi!”

Oyo Yakup imaranae. Isira reiso iasau pan anoe. Iahata, “Ira oe. Upuku Anahatana wain reini! Waini otoe reini. Ne muie reini samatoro uanei! Otoe reini reasiraku. Areini mo, Anahatana ne numa maa! Areini noiyaha nene mitanunue maa omi!”

Nene hanu omnanoe tau kinoke asi Yakup ihanui oyo inana hatu wani inaka unui tanui rei nanie iapuooi. Iapuooi tau hatu wani ereunaso anoo rapeka sapani na Anahatana itotoe osiki. Inana mina saitun oyo iohui roe hatu rei. Iohui roe hatu rei na iunai osi Anahatana ruai. Hatu reimo, hatu monne.
Ihete otoe rei nanae tau Betel wani nene manariti Anahatana ne numa. (Naone otoe rei nene nanae Lus.)
Oyo Yakup isopa, “Upuku Anahatana. Munata ano akata runaku runa asakaku tau arena tinai tihue reini runa arui we muaina runa apia
rotu-tu ununiku nau inaku runa amaku na iake mo, mka uainisi uainaa runaya rotu-tu ria supan.
Mka usama we sae man wani aruiki osiku tau pahakian hutusa samatoro urui pahakian osa osia. Hatu wani uapuooi reini, mka sio oainisi oainaa runaya mai tanui.”
Yakup ieui honu rotu-tu ihokai pan otoe wani ranie eresaa.

Ihokai pan oyo isira tau inoo parike pan otoe huie rei runa sio mamsaka rompau tonu. No rompau waron ranekeso sui parike nusue. Tonuso wason onapa-napa no netau umau honu nanie oruru hatu arihoni parike hahae rei. Nanie ouna no rompau rai raninu. Raninu pusi oruru hatu rei roe, ererohi parike hahae honu. Hatu reimo, hatu mainae.

Ihokai pan oyo isira tau inoo parike pan otoe huie rei runa sio mamsaka rompau tonu. No rompau waron ranekeso sui parike nusue. Tonuso wason onapa-napa no netau umau honu nanie oruru hatu arihoni parike hahae rei. Nanie ouna no rompau rai raninu. Raninu pusi oruru hatu rei roe, ererohi parike hahae honu. Hatu reimo, hatu mainae.
Yakup iasei tanso. Iahata, “Wea amau. Omi reini, omi on supa?”
Oahata, “Ami on pan nia Haran.”
Iahata, “Oationa Laban, Nahor momoi rei?”
Oahata, “E-e.”
Ita iasei honu, “Waipan sapan? Ne patane miri-mirike?”
Oahata, “E-e. Waipan ne patane mirike, tea. Io, noo pan, anai pina ia rei pan. Waini on pan irori amai ne rompau. Anai pina rei, nanai Rahel.”

Iahata, “Omi muna na orui mo rompau raninu tewa rei? Oruire na raninu oyo ororire ria monota na raaiso. Tewa mo, ranie waro mainae asi rei. Mka ramakaneaso. Munata onusure pan koka anoe nea, mka ramakaneaso.”
Oahata, “Rotu-tu pusima amanouma samatoro aruru hatu reini arihoni parike hahae. Arurui na arui mani rompau raninu.”
Wasoni oanamanaso asi, sira tau Rahel ihokai, irori amai ne rompau. Rahel, ia mamsaka rompau oi.
Taa Yakup inoo hotai Rahel ihoka runa ne rompau oyo iruru hatu rei arihoni parike hahae rei. Irurui samatoro irui Rahel ne rompau raninu.
Irui ne rompau raninu oyo iatipuniki oyo irani.
Iahata, “Hota. Au inaku mo, amam hotai.”
Taa Rahel iatinu san rei oyo irumai pan no numa nanie isima osi amai. Hoka pan oyo iahata, “Ama. Hotaku wain ihokai on poe otoe Kanaan.”

Taa Laban iatinu ata etei wain ihokai reiso irumai poe tanui. Hoka poe oyo iatipuniki imukiki. Oyo ieui ikatai pan ne numa. Ihokai pan numa oyo Yakup isima osi etei iahata, “Inaku runa amaku wasopo ia-iake. Oaisosiku mai na nanie unina we ia pina isa mai rei.”
Etei Laban iahata, “Titue. Ita mo, kaka wani.”
Oyo Yakup iruei mai etei ne numa hunane katemae.
Taue isa Laban iasau osi Yakup. Iahata, “Ete. Masike ioi umau tau kaka wani iae pene pakarian osiku san rei man. Kahurae asupu me pakarian rei nene hunonie. Ainisi ina arihoniku?”
Ne Laban ne hehuka pinau ua. Ia manaonete nanai Lea. Matai kania hele. Ne anai pina muie reimo nanai Rahel. Ia mo, ia iake tunne.
Ne Laban ne hehuka pinau ua. Ia manaonete nanai Lea. Matai kania hele. Ne anai pina muie reimo nanai Rahel. Ia mo, ia iake tunne.
Yakup iaunutu anoi tau Rahel nea. Reiso iahata, “Ete. Au pakarian osia rotu-tu musum itu hete nanie unana Rahel anamu pina muie rei.”
Iahata, “Nene iake ano ruam nanai. Na pene uruiki osi sio tamena nea. Reiso aruea mai rei.”
Oyo Yakup ipakarian rotu-tu musum itu na nanie inana Rahel. Anoi erematai pusu ia pina hehuke rei reiso iahana musum itu rai, sani onona hataya tonusa te atesa man.
Ipakarian rotu-tu musum itu oyo Yakup iasau osi etei, “Ete. Musum itu raniku nea, reiso pusita iapamata sou na uama aisenema nea.”
Taa san rei oyo etei iasau runa onone wani etei runa anai pina uaso mka aiseneso. Reiso oanaha runa sio noi niane anoe rei pusiki mai tau no karisaa.
Onana karisaa, nene mono rei etei isaa iautunu Rahel tewa ne iautunu Lea osi etei. Oyo etei ineke runai.
Etei iae irui Lea ne ia pina makahaie isa nanai Silpa.
Nene hanu omnanoe Yakup mato ianei ata ia reimo Lea. Oyo ieui pan etei. Iahata, “Ama. Aunaku san rei nanie taa hae? Au upakarian rotu-tu musum itu rai mo, nanie unana Rahel. Ama, akarotaku tau sae?”
Iahata, “Mai niane reini mo nene monne san rei. Ia muie mo iausaha iniku kakai tewa.
Reiso anapa rotu-tu maisene onona itu rai raniku samatoro anana Rahel honu. Ne mka apakarian osiku musum itu honu.”
Yakup iamanaku. Taa maisene rei nene onona itu pusire oyo amai irui Rahel osiki.
Amai iae irui Rahel ne ia pina makahaie isa nanai Bilha.
Yakup iae ineke ikata Rahel oi. Ne Yakup anoi pusiki runa Rahel arihoni Lea. Ita ipakarian musum itu honu.
Taa Yakup iausahai pusi oyo Upuri Anahatana inoo ata Yakup anoi pusiki runa Lea tewa. Reiso Upuri Anahatana irui Lea isusu ne Rahel mo isusu tewa.
Lea tinain taua oyo iruei runa anai hanaie isa. Iahata, “Upuri Anahatana inoo we kasiane reini. Reiso mka sahaku anoi runaku oi.” Reiso ihete anai hanaie rei nanai tau Ruben. Nene manariti mo,

Ita tinain taua honu. Oyo iruei runa ia iki hanaie isa honu. Iahata, “Upuri iatinu ata au mo sahaku anoi runaku tewa reiso irui ia ikine reini osiku oi.” Reiso ihete nanai tau Simeon. Simeon nene manariti mo,
Ita tinain taua honu. Oyo iruei runa ia iki hanaie isa honu. Iahata, “Mka sahaku ikataku sui osa. Tau sae? Ususu sio iki hanaia tonu.” Reiso ihete ia ikine rei nanai tau Lewi. Nene manariti mo,
Ita tinain taua honu. Oyo iruei runa ia iki hanaie isa honu. Iahata, “Nene taue reini uainaa runa Upuri Anahatana.” Reiso ihete ia ikine rei nanai tau Yehuda. Nene manariti mo,
. Iruei runa Yehuda oyo isusu tewa nea.
Ne Rahel mo, isusu tewa sirinia. Reiso ianana kakai. Iasau osi Yakup san rei, “Ano auna au anaku isa tewa? Munata auna anaku isa tewa mka umataku!”
Yakup iatinu san rei oyo anoi eresaa tau Rahel. Iahata, “Au mo, au Anahatana tewa. Ia sahoro irui ano asusu tewa rei.”
Reiso iahata, “Mai na anana Bilha, we ia makahaie reini na anekea runai na isusu osiku. Tau ia isusu mka sio oaoi au tau inai.”
Reiso irui ne makahaie Bilha osi sahai. Oyo sahai inekei runai.
Ineke runai san rei oyo tinain taua. Oyo Bilha iruei runa anai hanaie.

Rahel iahata, “Anahatana iatuhete ata au we isanae tau reini tewa. Reiso iatinu tau we mainisie. Reiso irui ia iki hanaie reini osiku.” Reiso ihete nanai tau Dan. Dan nene manariti, “Iapasanaku tewa.”
Ita Bilha tinain taua honu. Iruei runa ia iki hanaie isa. Sio iki hanaia ua nea.
Rahel iahata, “Aapataruna runa kakaku oo au we untu.” Reiso ihete ia ikine rei nanai tau Naftali. Nene manariti, “Apataruna.”
Taa Lea ianei ata ia mka isusu tewa nea, reiso irui ne ia makahaie rei osi sahai. Ne makahaie rei nanai Silpa. Reiso Yakup inekei runai oyo tinain taua.
Oyo iruei runa ia iki hanaie isa.
Lea iahata, “Au usupu iake nea!” Reiso ihete nanai tau Gad. Gad nene manariti, “Usupu iake.”
Ita Silpa tinain taua honu. Iruei runa ia iki hanaie isa honu.
Lea iahata, “Anoku mirike. Mka sio pinau oasau oahata au anoku mirike.” Reiso ihete ia iki hanaie rei nanai tau Asyer. Nene manariti, “Anoi mirike.”

Tau musum manei nanie. (Manei, nooi sani ana.) Ruben ieui napi ria nisi. Hoka ria oyo isupu ai totue isa nanie ereuna sio osusu. Oyo iroriki osi inai. Ne hoka nau numa oyo Rahel inooi. Inooi oyo iainisi arihoni kakai. Iahata, “Asamaku tau me ai totue wani anamu hanaie isupui reini na mkane osiku.”
Iahata, “Ano anana au sahaku nea. Ineke ikataku tewa nea. Mka nanie anana ai totue wani anaku hanaie isupui reini?”
Iahata, “Reiso arui anamu hanaie ne ai totue reino mai. Samatoro mka-mkasini mono sahaku inekei ikataya.”

Reiso taa Yakup inuniki on ria nisi tau nene ranie manne rei mo, Lea inapai. Oyo iahata, “Ano tau mono reipan aneke akatama mai numa. Tewa mo, uasau osi saham nea. Urui anaku hanaie ne ai totue wani isupui ria nisi. Reiso usehaya tau ai totue rei nea.”
Nene mono rei oyo Yakup inekei runa Lea.
Lea iainisi reiso Anahatana iatinu tanui. Reiso tinain taua. Ita isusu ne ia iki hanaie isa honu. Ne hehuka hanaia sio nima nea.
Oyo iahata, “Anahatana irui iake osiku. Tau sae urui we ia makahaie osi sahaku.” Reiso ihete nanai tau Isakhar. Nene manariti, “Anahatana iuni iake.”
Ita Lea tinain taua honu. Iruei runa ia iki hanaie isa honu. Ne sio iki hanaia sio nome nea.

Iahata, “Anahatana irui ia ikine rei sani sinente wani iake nai osa. Reiso muie reini mka sahaku iamuiraku. Tau sae? Ususu ne sio iki hanaia nome nea.” Reiso ihete ia iki hanaie rei nanai tau Sebulon. Nene manariti, “Anahatana irui iake.”
Ita tinain taua honu. Iruei runa anai pina isa. Ihete nanai tau Dina.
Oyo Anahatana anoi runa Rahel. Iatinu tau ne mainisie reiso Anahatana iruiki isusu.
Oyo tinain taua. Iruei runa anai hanaie isa. Iahata, “Anahatana iunaku ususu nea na pene sio ouna pumaaku.”
Reiso ihete nanai tau Yusup. Nene manariti, “Hete ususu honu.” Ihete nanai oyo iahata, “Uainisi na Upuri Anahatana irui anaku hanaie isa honu.”
Taa Rahel iruei runa Yusup oyo Yakup iasau osi amai. Iahata, “Ama. Uainisi arihonia na ununiku poe we niane nea.
Runa arui me hehuka runa mea momou. Tau sae? Upakarian osia reimo noso sio. Tapiso osiku na pusima anunima. Tewa mo, ukonaupua rotu-tu reini nea rei tea.”
Amai iahata, “Atinu ee. Au usupu akakinate ata Upuri Anahatana irui iake osiku rei tau ano arue mai tanuku. Reiso pene aeu nea.
Ainisi sae arihoniku?”
Iahata, “Ama. Ano ruam anei nea, tea?. Upakarian panesi osia nea. Reiso me makapanau panesi tau au uapiarare.

Tau uhoka tewasi, reimo me makapanau panesi tewasi. Ne muie reini mo me makapanau panesi nea. Reiso me kaya nea. Upuri Anahatana irui iake osia rei pusu au. Reiso au ruaku nanie upakarian osi ruaku we pina hehuka pan muie oi.”
Iahata, “Sae wani mka uruiki osia honu?”
Iahata, “Ruae nea. Ama. Pene arui sae isa osiku nea. Mka usaka me makapanau sirinia. Hete sae amanaku we anamanae reini.

Ranie hatae reini ueuku uarinii me makapanau na unana rompau waron nikapanta runa waron maniahua. Unana rompa anaya waron metena. Unana une-uneu waron nikapanta runa waron maniahua. Unanare osi ruaku. Hasae uainisi rai man.

Pani muie samatoro amaku ruam anei. Ata kani we manisate te tewa. Sani taue isa ahoka arinii we makapanau asupu une-uneu waron nikapanta tewa, te waron maniahua tewa runa rompa anaya waron metena tewa samatoro anei noi rei ata unehure.”
Iahata, “Iake. Ita iuna sae wani ano asaui rei.”
Ne ranie hatae rei amai ianena une-une waron nikapanta runa waron maniahua osi ruai. Ianena rompa anaya waron metena osi ruai. Oyo iaisosi ne hehuka hanaia osakare.
Oyo ne hehuka hanaia rei oeu okata makapanau rai rahainau arihoni Yakup. Oeu onona tonu samatoro ohokaso pan tihue rei, oo makapanau nesia rai, osi Yakup isakare.
Ne Yakup inana ai sana mataya rerihoni ai hawar, ai badam, runa ai berangan oyo inuki nene unta nanie iunare makinikata.
Iuna pusire oyo iaunuture mai makapanau nene tihu naniae. Tau sae? Makapanau rai nanie raninu mo, rakata umau ee.
Reiso munata makapanau rai rakata umau mai ai sanaya waron makinikata rai, mka nene anaya makinikata maniahua san rei oi.
Ita Yakup inana rompau ramanane une-uneu waron makinikata. Iuna san rei na ruai isupu ne makapanau na ineare arihoni amai ne makapanau.
Yakup inapa rotu-tu inoo makapanau waron ramkona nanie rakata umau samatoro iuna ai sanaya rai poe tihu.

Ne inoo makapanau waron rakua tewa nanie rakata umau mo, iaunutu tewa. Reiso makapanau waron putia reimo rakua tewa. Araimo amai hanahanai ne makapanau. Ne makapanau waron metena, nikapanta, runa maniahua waron ramkona reimo Yakup ne makapanau.

Reiso Yakup ne makapanau panesi. Ne une-uneu, ne rompau, ne unta, ne keledaiu panesi. (Unta mo, makapana wani nene totu unie mo, nene pupua sonota. Keledai, nooi sani naitanane ne ikine.) Ne manianeu panesi. Reiso Yakup iakanihu amai san rei reiso ne kaya mainae.
Nene ranie hatae isa Yakup iatinu ata nea saua oasau tanui. Oahata, “Sauri reimo, inana pusi amari ne makapanau reiso ne kaya. Inana re rusun pusire.”
Yakup iae inoo amai ne muiran runai sani naone tewa nea.
Reiso Upuri Anahatana iasau osiki. Iahata, “Anunia poe amam ne niane poe amam runa me mansiau poe otoe Kanaan nea. Mka ukata runaya.”
Taa san rei oyo Yakup ianaha runa ne pinau uaso na opusui ria otoe wani isaka ne makapanau rai.
Ohokaso ria oyo iahata, “Mai na uasau sou reini osi uamo. Unoo amari iamuiraku sani naone rei tewa nea. Ne Anahatana wain amaku iainisi iainaa runai wain ikata runaku sirinia.
Uamo ruamo oanei nea, tea? Au pakarian osi amari rotu-tu uhunu-hunu ruaku.
Masike upakarian uhunu-hunu ruaku san rei iae, amari iakarotaku sirinia. Iasa-sawariku rotu-tu nai hutusa raini. Ne Anahatana itapi amari iuna kahatene tanuku tewa.

Taue isa amari iahata, ‘Makapanau waron nikapanta rai mka osi ano.’ Oyo rompau runa une-uneu rai rarue runa nene anaya rai poe oo, nikapanta. Ne munata iahata, ‘Makapanau waron maniahua rai mka osi ano.’ Oyo makapanau rai rarue runa nene anaya poe oo, maniahua sirinia.
Reiso Anahatana inana makapanau waron amari rei osiku.
Tau makapanau nene musum nanie rakata umau oyo uneke uamnii. Unoo une-une hanaia rakata une-une nikapanta runa maniahua.
Uneke uamnii Anahatana ne maisosie on roe noiyaha iasau osiku. Iahata, ‘Yakup.’
Oyo usana, ‘Oe. Upu.’”
Iahata, “Masi anoo makapanau waron rakata umau reimo une-une hanaia pusire nikapanta runa maniahua. Unoo sae waron amam hanahanai iuna tanua rei nea. Reiso au unenire san rei.

Au mo, au Anahatana wani uatuhete ruaku osia poe nia Betel rei. Uatuhete ruaku osia oyo asuhu mina saitun roe hatu hahae wani anaka unumu tanui rei. Asuhu mina, samatoro asopa osiku. Reiso autotu me apia pusire nea, na anunia poe me niane.”
Ne pinau oahata, “Amari ne kausae wanae isa osima tewa nea.
Ami mo, inooma sani ami tamena. Iahenima nea. Inana ami hunonima pusire ne iapahia pusire nea. Iapahia iwena-wenare nea.
Anahatana inana makapanau waron ami runa mani hehuka mani pahakian inanare arihoni amari nea. Reiso auna sae wani Anahatana iaisosia rei.”

Taa san rei oyo Yakup iautotu ne numa hutae pusiki, nanie inuniki poe amai Isak, poe ne niane hahae poe otoe Kanaan. Iapusaa ne pina hehuka roe unta. (Unta mo, makapana wani nene totu unie mo, nene pupua sonota.) Iapusaa pusiso roe unta samatoro ikatu ne makapanau waron isupure mai otoe Mesopotamia.

Taa san rei oyo Yakup iautotu ne numa hutae pusiki, nanie inuniki poe amai Isak, poe ne niane hahae poe otoe Kanaan. Iapusaa ne pina hehuka roe unta. (Unta mo, makapana wani nene totu unie mo, nene pupua sonota.) Iapusaa pusiso roe unta samatoro ikatu ne makapanau waron isupure mai otoe Mesopotamia.

Ranie hatae wani sio oeuso rei mo, noa ama waira iatori ne rompau nene hunua. Tau ranie hatae rei iae Rahel inana iauhuni amai ne anahatana wani titue tewa nene siaie isa. Siaie wani ereruei mai numa eresakaso.
Oeuso rei, Yakup isima osi amai tewa.
Inana pusi ne numa hutae pusiki oyo orumaso. Osipu toha Wae Efrat na oeuso poe otoe Gilead, nanie opusu pupua poe rei.
Nene onona ua nau san rei samatoro sio osima. Oahata, “Laban. Me hehuka wason suru poe oeuso arihonia nea. Osima osia oe?”
Iahata, “Tewa maa!”
Oyo Laban iamanou ne mansiau samatoro oeu opususo. Oeuso rotu-tu onona nome samatoro osupu nahao oyo opususo sui pupua Gilead.

Laban sio osupu Yakup sio mo, oapuoo no numa wani sio onanai arihoni makapanau unta nea. Oapuooi roe pupua ria Gilead rei. Ria pupua rei iae Laban sio onekeso oi. Nene mono rei ineke iamnii Anahatana ihokai mai tanui oyo iahata, “Ainati. Pene akapuku tau Yakup.”

Laban sio osupu Yakup sio mo, oapuoo no numa wani sio onanai arihoni makapanau unta nea. Oapuooi roe pupua ria Gilead rei. Ria pupua rei iae Laban sio onekeso oi. Nene mono rei ineke iamnii Anahatana ihokai mai tanui oyo iahata, “Ainati. Pene akapuku tau Yakup.”
Laban ineke iamnii oyo nene hanu omnanoe ieui roe tanui. Iahata, “Yakup. Ano auna au san rei taa hae? Akarotaku nanie taa hae? Aruma arori we hehuka sani sio wason osotaso tau manahitane?

Amuna na on pan oeumo osima osiku tewa nea rei? Ne sani oasau osiku mka utapiso osia na anori miri-mirika. Mka iuna maisene. Iuna karisaa mainae. Iahinata. Iakapeti tihana waron nene mamono inata. Iaise maisene isa nooi sani gitar.
Na umuki we hehuka wea momou na pusita iauhaa umau. Arirunea!
Au we kawasa una kahatene tanua. Ne monosi Anahatana wain amam iainisi iainaa runai isopo na pene uanamana makae tanua.
Au uanei nea ata ano nanie anunia reimo anom ererihu runa me niane. Ne amuna na anana we siaie wani eresaka we numa rei?”
Iahata, “Ama. Ueu umene-mene rei tau ukaitau, pene rotu-tu asopo mea momou runa noa inau.

Ne arihoni siaie wani asau runai reimo, masi ruam aninai. Ne munata asupui mai ami reini pusima, ano ruam ahunui. Pene apuhaiki. Anina, hitio me sae umau waron reimo, ananare. Ananare na amanoure mai na uata re mansiau onoo.” Ne Yakup ianei tewa ata sahai Rahel sahoro inana amai ne siaie rei.
Oyo noa ama inusui pan ne msahane ne numa unta oyo ininai. Ita inina pan Lea runa no makahaia ua rei no numa unta oi. Ne isupui tewa. Samatoro inusui pan anai pina muie ne numa unta honu.

Ne Rahel inana siaie rei iaunutui pan tasi. Tasi wani sio okanihooi tau naniai wani iru-ruei tanui roe unta totu hahae. Inana siaie rei samatoro Rahel iruei iese tanui mai numa anoe. Amai ininai isui nehu ne numa anoe ne isupui tewa sirinia.
Rahel iahata, “Ama. Pene akapuku tanuku kee. Tewa mo, uhitio unapaya iake tewa. Tewa mo, au wani uneniku.”
Ne amai ininai ia-ia sirinia ne isupui tewa.
Isupui tewa reiso Yakup anoi eresaa. Iahata, “Ama. Au una isanae sae tanua? Te we masana mainae sae tanua na rotu-tu asui aka-kaohuku sani akaohu peni rei?
Ama. Anina sui nehu pusi mani numa anoa nea. Asupu me apia umau mai tanuma? Saka ahokare mai na autuere kua rei na re mansiau onoore. Onoore na oasau ia seia wain inanare rei.
Musum hutu ua urueku ukataya. Me rompau runa me une-uneu rasusu panesi nea. Ranahu tewa. Une-une hanaie isa nanie uaiki man oo tewa oi.
Ne makapanau waron binatang waron rasea raaire rei oo, ununi rorire osia tewa. Ne ruaku ukatire. Waroni sio okimanakare tau mono te tau ranie oo, ano asau tanuku na ukatire.
Tau ranie, umataku tau ranie titie. Tau pumono, umataku tau mahatane. Nanie uneke man oo, tewa oi.

Eresuniku tau pakarian san rei rotu-tu musum hutu ua raini nea. Upakarian musum hutusa rahana ate tau nanie unana me hehuka pinau uaso. Ita musum nome rai upakarian nanie usupu une-uneu runa rompau arihonia. Upakarian nanie usupu makapanau arihonia ne asa-sawariku rotu-tu nai hutusa.

Sinana pene Anahatana wain amaku runa momoku Abraham uaso oainisi oainaa runai rei ikata runaku mo, mka aisosiku ununiku unaku-nakuku. Ne Anahatana wain amaku Isak iamuirai ikata runaku. Ianei we kausa wanaya rai. Reiso monosi iasau osia rei, tea?”

Laban iasau osi Yakup iahata, “Lea runa Rahel, au we hehuka pinau. Uaso no hehuka, au we kawasa tanso. Me rompau, me une-uneu rai, mo au. Ne sae waron ano anoore mai rei mo, araimo au we numa hutae. Ne kani umuna na uni we hehuka, wea momou oi?
Reiso mai na uata isopa. Iapuoo hatu rei.”
Reiso Yakup inana hatu isa iapuooi na anoo rapeka tau uaso osopa rei.
Oyo iaisosi ne mansiau iahata, “Oamanou hatu mai na oranere.”
Orane pusire oyo onana muaine na oaiso mai hatu nusue rei.
Amai ihete hatu rei nanae tau Yegar-Sahaduta. Ne Yakup ihete nanae tau Galed.
Laban iahata, “Mka inoo hatu waron oranere reini anori rapeka runa isopa rei.” Reiso otoe rei nanae Galed. Galed nene manariti “Hatu waron oranere na anoo rapeka.”
Ita iahata, “Uainisi na Upuri Anahatana isaka inoo uata masike irue hainau umau.” Reiso otoe rei nanae Mispa. Mispa nene manariti “Numa wani noa-noae osi sio mamsakaya.”
Ita iasau honu, “Munata auna kahatene tau we hehuka pinau te, anana sio pina tamena mo, masike ia isa ianei tewa iae, Anahatana wain inoota.
Hatu raini waron oranere runa hatu wani ereoo reini, inoore oyo anori rapeka.
Mka uniku hatu waron oranere na una kahatene tanua tewa. Ano iae, mka aniku hatu waron oranere runa hatu wani ereoo, ano mka anikure tewa na auna kahatene tanuku.
Uainisi na Anahatana wain Abraham runa amaku Nahor runa noa ama oainisi oainaa runai, isaka iapasanata.”
Ne Yakup isopa ihete Anahatana wain amai Isak iamuirai.
Reiso Yakup irehi makapana roe pupue rei osi Anahatana, oyo ianaha runa ne mansiau na pusiso oaiso. Oaiso pusi oyo onekeso.
Nene hanu omnanoe Laban imuki nea momou runa ne hehuka pinau, iainisi na Anahatana irui iake osiso samatoro inuniki.
Yakup runa Laban osopa pusi oyo suru poe Yakup sio ohitio oeuso. Oeuso oyo Anahatana ne sio maisosia on roe noiyaha umau ohokaso mai tanui.
Inooso oyo iahata, “Naniaku reini Anahatana naniai.”
Reiso ihete nanae tau Mahanaim. Mahanaim nene manariti “Naniaka ua.”
Taa san rei oyo Yakup iaisosi ne makahaia na oeu oanaoneso poe otoe Edom, nanie osima osi kakai Esau.
Yakup iasau osiso. Iahata, “Oasau osi kakaku san rei. ‘Me maniane Yakup nanie inuniki mai tanua. Tewa mo, iruei potuina ikata Laban nea.

Reiso muie reini ne koropou, ne rompau, ne une-uneu, runa ne keledaiu. (Keledai nooi sani naitanane ne ikine man.) Ne manorina. Reiso upu, ia iauwatu ne anamanae reini osia. Iainisi na arui iake osiki.’”

Ne makahaia oeu poe oasau. Oasau pusi oyo on poe onuniso. Oahata, “Upu. Ami asupu kakamu nea. Reiso ia iae wain on poe tau arena tinai tihue nea. Nanie ihokai mai tanua. Ne wain on poe ikata sio utuni ate.”

Yakup iatinu tau rei reiso ikaitau hunu ruai. Reiso ne mansiau wason okatai rei mo, isamaso tau ua. Isama ne rompau, ne une-uneu, ne koropou, runa ne unta tau ua oi. (Unta mo, makapana wani nene totu unie nene pupua sonota.)
Iasau pan anoe iahata, “unata kakaku ihokai mai na iahita runa sio wason roe uae rei na okua tewa, mka sio wason hae muie rei kani osihaso?”

Reiso iainisi. Iahata, “Upuku Anahatana ano wani momoku Abraham runa amaku Isak oainisi oainaa runaya. Ano aisosiku na ununiku poe we niane na ukata we mansiau. Ano atotoe ata mka arui iake osiku na we hehuka panesi, we makapanau panesi, we sae man panesi.

Ne Upu, ano arui iake osi au, me manorine. Ano akata runaku ne au mo, au ikine honue reiso sapani na uararuma ano me iaka rai? Tau au on mai ueuku usipu toha Wae Yordan. Hasae urori we karupae man. Sae isa tewa. Ne muie reini mo, au wani ununiku runa we apia, we pina hehuka, we makapanau panesi rotu-tu usamaso tau ua.
Uainisi runa anoku pusiki arihonia na asaka apuheuku arihoni kakaku. Ukaitau pene rotu-tu ihokai mai, iahita runaku na we pinau runa no hehuka reini.

Upu. Uainisi arihoni na anom erepeka runa sae wani atotoe osiku rei. Mka arui iake osiku na we hehuka panesi, we makapanau panesi, we sae man panesi. Wea upu panesi reiso ia isa man mka ireken kuaso tewa. Tau sae? Sio panesi sani sisia nau nuae.”
Onekeso pan rei oyo nene hanu omnanoe isama ne makapanau umau osi kakai.
Isamai tau une-une pinau utuni ua, une-une hanaia hutu ua, rompa pinau utuni ua, rompa hanaia hutu ua,
unta hutu tonu runa nene anaya waron rasusu-susu asi, koropou pinau hutu ate, koropou hanaia hutusa, keledai pinau hutu ua, runa keledai hanaia hutusa oi. (Keledai nooi sani naitanane ne ikine man.)
Isama-samare tau polotu-polotu inasa rai. Iruire osi ne makahaia sana osa-osa iahata, “Oeumo oanaone. Osaka na polotu isa rehainau arihoni polotu isa.”
Iasau osi ia wain ianaone iahata, “Munata kakaku isupumo na iasei tanumo, iahata, ‘Moa upu tau ia seia? Nanie oeumo sui supa? Ia seia ne makapanau waromo okature rei?’
Saka oasau oahata, ‘Araini mo me maniane Yakup nanie iruire osia. Mania upu ruai wain on pan tau muie asi.’”
Iasau osi ne makahaia wason osaka polotu tamena. Iahata, “Osupu kakaku, omi iae oasau san rei sirinia.
Oasau, ‘Me maniane Yakup wain on pan tau muie asi.’” Iahata pan anoe, “Munata urui makapanau raini osiki hitio kani mka anoi runaku? Kani anoi kanihue runa we masana wani on naone rei?”
Reiso iauwatu ne makapanau osi kakai naone oo, ia ruai inekei mai ne numa wani sio onanai arihoni makapana unta asi.
Nene mono rei Yakup ihanu oyo ieu iautunu ne pinau uaso, no makahaia uaso, runa no hehuka hanaia sio hutusa rahana osa rei. Iautunuso na ruao oeu osipu toha Wae Yabok.
Iautunu pusiso oyo iaisosi ne makahaia orori ne apia pusire poe waene on poe hae.
Ne ia ruai on mai hae asi.
Oyo sira tau inoo ia hanaie isa ihokai mai tanui ipalapaposona runai rotu-tu haineke nanie omnanoe.
Ia hanaie rei ianei ata mka inesiki tewa, reiso iakahuu Yakup kanakai na ikuparehiki. Reiso ne unia rarue sana.
Reiso ia hanaie rei iahata, “lapasiku na ueuku. Tewa mo ranie mka eresaa nea rei.”
Iahata, “Ualapasia tewasi. Rotu-tu arui iake osiku ee.”
Iahata, “Nanamu seia?”
“Nanaku Yakup.”
Iahata, “Nanamu Yakup tewa nea. Tau sae ano apalapaposona runa Anahatana na tumata reiso me untu. Reiso ukati nanam tau Israel.” Israel nene manariti “Palapaposona runa Anahatana.”
Iahata, “Masi asima runa nanam.”
Iahata, “Asei runa nanaku nanie taa hae?” Oyo irui iake osi Yakup.
Iahata, “Ira. Unoo Anahatana uai anoe, tea? Ne iapuhaiku asi maa!” Reiso ihete naniao rei tau Pniel. Pniel nene manariti mo,
Inoo ata ranie eresaa nea oyo ieui iarihoni Pniel ne ieu seu-seu. Tau sae? Ne unia mai kanakai rasana.
Reiso Israel nea upu oai muaine wani nene henate erenete unie wani kanakae rei tewa. Oaiki tewa rotu-tu reini. Tau sae? Anahatana iakahuu Yakup kanakai rotu-tu unia rarue sana.
Yakup inoo Esau runa ne netau sio utuni ate wason ohokaso. Reiso isama Lea ne hehuka, Rahel ne hehuka, runa no makahaia rei no hehuka pusiso.
Isamaso oyo ianena no makahaia runa no hehuka roe uae. Ita Lea runa ne hehuka paka tihue. Samatoro Rahel runa Yusup hae muie nai osa.
Ne Yakup irori uae. On nau nanie ieui ihaineke kakai ihahue rotu-tu nai itu.
Ne Esau irumai nau inopa wanin. Inopai oyo imukiki. Oyo uaso orani.
Ne Esau inoo sio pinau runa no hehuka rei, oyo iasei, “Seiso wason okataya reini?”
Iahata, “Upu. We hehuka wason Anahatana iruiso osiku. Anahatana irui iake osiku reiso irui we hehuka panesi reini, tea?”
Taa san rei oyo no makahaia runa no hehuka oeuso mai ohainekei, ohahue mai tanui.
Ita Lea runa ne hehuka samatoro Yusup runa inai ohainekei oyo ohahue mai tanui oi.
Esau iahata, “Makapanau polotu-polotu waron sinasi ororire mai tanuku rei, nanie tau sae?”
Iahata, “Upu. Nanie rauna anom iake tanuku.”
Ne iahata, “Pene nea. Au we makapanau panesi nea. Pene arui osiku nea.”

Iahata, “Pene. Nanare noi. Sani anom iake runaku nea mo, anana makapanau rai noi. Au una sana tanua ne anom eresaa tanuku tewa nea, areimo sani una sana tau Anahatana ne iapuheui. Reiso unoo uamu anoe mo, areimo sani unoo Anahatana uai anoe.
Uainisi arihonia na araruma we makapanau waron urorire osia reini. Anahatana irui iake osiku reiso irui sae waron uninare.” Yakup itentene sirinia reiso kakai inana ne makapanau.
Oyo Esau iahata, “Mai na ieuta. Ueu uanaone arihonimo.”

Iahata, “Upu. Ruamu anei we sio ikina reimo omankaeso. Samatoro kahurae au ueu manu-manu. Tewa mo, we makapanau waron rasusu asi. Munata ueu usapae runare mo, mka ramata pusire. Masike usapae runare ranie hatae osa man iae, mka ramata pusire.
Reiso upu, aeu anaonea. Ami on mai apusua manu-manu. Ueu ukatu sio ikina runa makapanau rotu-tu ahokama poe tanumo poe otoe Edom.”
Iahata, “Munata sanreimo iake. Mka uarihoni we netau umau osia na oakahaia.”
Ne iahata, “Upu. Ruae nea. Pene anom reuponu runaku. Hete sae anom iake runaku.”
Reiso Esau inuniki napi roe Edom tau ranie hatae rei sirinia.

Ne Yakup ieui napi poe nia Sukot. Hoka poe iapuoo ne numa wani sio onanai rerihoni makapana unta rei. Iapuooi oyo inana koka osi ne makapanau. Inana koka rei, reiso sio oaoi niane rei nanae tau Sukot. Sukot nene manariti, “Kokau.”
Reiso sio oeuso on pan otoe Mesopotomia rotu-tu ohokaso mai kota Sikhem mai otoe Kanaan iake oyo oapuoo no numa unte. Oapuooi mai kota nusue. Ohokaso mai no patana miri-mirika sirinia.
Mai naniao rei mo, ohane tuamane rei rerihoni Hemor nea upu. Hemor mo, Sikhem amai. Ohane tau nene hunonie perak inata utuni.
Hoka mai oyo Yakup irane hatu noore sani anau nanie iainisi iainaa runa Anahatana. Ihete hatu rai nanae tau El Elohe Israel. Nene manariti
Yakup sio orueso mai kota Sikhem mai otoe Kanaan oyo ereeu taue isa Yakup anai pina Dina ieui iaisei sui ne netau, sio pina Kanaan rei. Dina mo, inai tau Lea.
Ieui iaisei oyo Hemor anai hanaie Sikhem inooi. Hemor mo, ia arihoni ipa Hewa. Ia sahoro irime otoe rei. Reiso Sikhem inooi oyo iruma iroriki na nanie inesiki na ineke runai.
Ne iaunutu anoi tanui rotu-tu anoi pusiki runai oi. Reiso ianamana iake osiki.
Sikhem iasau osi amai san rei, “Ama. Au uainisi arihonia na anusu ainisi ia pina hehuke rei osiku na unanai.”

Yakup iatinu ata anai pina nanai rekahatei nea. Ne, ne hehuka hanaia wasomo osaka no makapanau ria otoe huie wani nene monota asi. Reiso iamaturui runa masana rei rotu-tu ne hehuka hanaia onuniso on ria otoe huie rei.
Hemor ihokai mai Yakup na nanie iainisi Dina osi anai hanaie.
Ihokai oyo sira tau Yakup ne hehuka hanaia ohokaso. Oatinu masana rei osira anoo rasaa hunu ruao. Tau oatinu ata Sikhem iapahia noa hota. Areimo iuna pumaa sio Israel pusiso.
Hemor iasau osi Yakup iahata, “Upu. Au anaku hanaie Sikhem anoi pusiki runa anamu pina. Reiso uainisi arihonia na arui anamu pina osiki na uaso onana umau.
Mai na uata iapamata sou. Ano me hehuka runa au we hehuka mka oausaha onusu hoka umau.
Oruemo mai tanuma sui supan mai kota reini pusu ruamo mo maue. Oahen sae man ohane sae man mai kota reini.”
Sikhem iasau osi Dina amai runa nea hotau san rei, “Wea upu. Uainisi arihonimo na oamanaku we sou reini. Mka urui sae man wani omi ainisiki.
Oasau runa hunonin ina man iae mka uruire osimo. Hete sae orui mo ia iki pina reini na unanai.”
Sikhem iuna noa hota nanai rekahatei reiso nea hotau oakarota Sikhem runa amai uaso.
Oahata, “Munata ami arui mania hota inana omi wason oeu waene tewasi mo, ami aumaa.
Ami amanaku hete sae omi sani ami. Areimo omi hanaia pusimo kahurae oeu waene.
Oeu waene samatoro arui mania hota osia na iausaha inusu ihoka umau. Ami mka arue akatamo. Ioi umau tau kaka wani.
Ne munata omi openemo tau oeu waene mo, ami mka anana mania hota arihonia oyo aeuma.”
Sikhem runa amai oatinu tau sou rei iake.
Reiso Sikhem inina nanie oeu waene on sini. Tau sae? Anoi pusiki runa Dina. Mai kota rei Sikhem sahoro sio oamuirai mainae arihoni ne numa anoe pusiso.

Oanamana osi Yakup sio pusi oyo Hemor runa anai hanaie uaso oeuso pan kota rei nene mitanunue. Pani mitanunue rei sio kota anoe pusiso osaka oamanouso oana-anamana osi umau. Reiso uaso oasau osi sio kota anoe san rei.

Oahata, “Wea amau pusimo utumo. Arinii we sou reini. Sio Israel wason orueso mai ita re kota reini mo, ita re netau. Reiso itapiso orueso mai reini okatata. Orueso onusu ohoka oahen ohane sui supan man ruao no maue. Otoe reini mo hekani. Reiso orueso tanui iae iake. Ita iausahata inusu ihoka iake.
Ne sio rei nanie orue okatata na ioi umau tau kaka wani, hete sae ipusu sio no sou isa. Areimo kahurae ita hanaia pusita ieu waene sani sio ruao.
Mka no makapanau runa no numa hutaya pusire osita, tea? Reiso mai na ipusu no sou rei na orue okatata.”
Sio pusiso mai kota anoe rei wason oamanouso oamanaku tau Hemor runa anai hanaie uaso no anamanae rei. Reiso sio hanaia pusiso mai kota rei oeu waene.

Ereruma nene onona tonu sio hanaia wason oeu waene rei oahana raina asi. Yakup ne hehuka hanaia ua onana no tunua. Uaso wason Dina nea hotau. Nanao Simeon runa Lewi. Onana no tunua oyo onusu oauhuniso pan kota anoe. Ohunu sio hanaia pusiso.
Ohunu Hemor runa Sikhem oi. Ohunuso oyo onana Dina arihoni Sikhem ne numa samatoro oeuso.
Ohunu pusiso samatoro uaso noa kakau noa waniu ohokaso mai owahu sio Sikhem no numa hutaya pusire. Owahu pusire tau Sikhem iuna noa hota nanai rekahatei.
Onana no makapanau. Areimo onana no une-uneu, no rompau, no koropou, runa no keledaiu. (Keledai nooi sani naitanane ne ikine.) Onana no sae man waromo pan kota anoe rei runa no nisiu.
Onana no apia pusire waron nene hunonia mainaya. Osota sio pinau runa no hehuka pusiso. Owahu pusi no numa hutaya.

Ohokaso mai numa oyo noa ama iasau osi Simeon runa Lewi uaso san rei. Iahata, “Omi ouna siraka reini tanuku tau sae rei? Mka sio mai Kanaan runa sio Peris wason orue mai otoe reini openeso tanuku. Ita mo, ita panesi tewa. Munata sio reini pusiso okata umau na oahita runata, mka pusita imatata.”
Oahata, “Ami atapi mania hota osi sio unai sani ia pina numa naue tewa.”

Taue isa Anahatana iasau osi Yakup iahata, “Oeumo poe nia Betel na oruemo poe rei. Arane hatu noore sani anau. Aranere na ainisi ainaa runa au, Anahatana, tanure. Naone arumaya arihoni kakamu Esau, au Anahatana sahoro uatuhete ruaku osia rei.”
Reiso Yakup iasau osi ne pina hehuka runa sio wason okatai rei. Iahata, “Pesi sio rakana no siaia waromo tanumo. Siaia rerihoni anahatanau waron titue tewa. Osohumo samatoro okati mo papita.

Mai na ieuta poe Betel. Mka urane hatu noore sani anau na iainisi iainaa runa Anahatana. Anahatana wain iatinu tau mainisie. Anoku ereruei tewa reiso uainisi arihoniki oyo iakahaiku. Ikata runaku sui supan man.”
Reiso orui no siaia runa no pua-puana waron opakere sani ai totua na raneteso rei. Oruire osi Yakup samatoro ikanire na pene opakere nea. Ikanire poe ai onate nohue haineke kota Sikhem.
Tau Yakup sio ohitio oeu oyo Anahatana iuna niana waisa okaitauso. Okaitau reiso osuiso tewa.
Oeu rotu-tu ohokaso poe otoe Kanaan. Ohokaso poe Betel wani naone nanae Lus.

Ohokaso poe, oyo Yakup irane hatu noore sani anau na iainisi iainaa runa Anahatana. Ihete otoe rei tau El-Betel wani nene manariti, “Anahatana wain iatuhete ruai osiku mai Betel.” Ihete otoe rei tau Anahatana iatuhete ruai osiki pan rei on irumai arihoni kakai.
Pani Betel iae Ribka ne mampakananae wain nanai Debora imatai. Imatai oyo okaniki poe ai onate nohue rei oi. Reiso ohete ai onate rei tau “Ai Mananokone.”
Yakup inuniki on pan otoe Mesopotamia oyo Anahatana iatuhete ruai osiki honu. Itotoe ata mka irui iake osiki.
Iahata, “Ano mka sio oaoia tau Yakup tewa nea. Ne mka oaoia tau Israel.
Au mo, au Anahatana wani we kawasa mainae erenesi pusire. Mka asusu haha panesi. Mea upu mea momou mka ouna niana panesi. Ouna otoa panesi. Mea upu mea momou mka ouna aiau.
Tuamane wani uruiki osi momom Abraham runa amam Isak reini iae, mka uruiki osi ano runa mea upu mea momou oi.”
Yakup nene manariti “Iakarota”. Ne Israel nene manariti “Ipalapaposona runa Anahatana”.
Anahatana ianamana pusi oyo ieu iarihoni Yakup.

Mai tihue wani Anahatana iatuhete ruai osi Yakup rei, Yakup iapuoo hatu isa. Iapuooi na sio anoo rapeka runa Anahatana iatuhete ruai osiki rei. Iapuooi oyo isona mina saitun runa tihu anggur roe hatu hahae rei. Isonare nanie iainisi iainaa runa Anahatana.
Ihete tihue rei nanae tau Betel. Nene manariti, “Anahatana ne numa.”
Yakup sio ohitio oeuso oarihoni nia Betel. Ne sio wason arena tinai tihue hainau arihoni nia Efrata asi, oimo Rahel ina-inaso nea. Ne anai rei iamrae eresuni.
Tiai ereun mainae nea oyo ia pian iahata, “Rahel. Apamese anom. Anamu reini mo, ia iki hanaie honu.”

Ne Rahel nahai nanie erenikui nea ihete anai rei nanai tau Ben-oni. Nene manariti “Anaku iuna sinsaraku.” Ne amai ihete nanai tau Benyamin. Nene manariti, “Anaku hanaku wanane.” Hanai wanane nene manariti sio oamuirai.
Rahel imatai oyo sio okaniki haineke arena nusue wani nanie ereeu poe Efrata rei. Muie reini Efrata, sio oiki tau Betlehem.
Yakup iapuoo hatu isa roe kupuro hahae na nanie sio onoo na oationa ata reini mo, Rahel ne kupuro. Hatu rei wapan rotu-tu muie reini.
Okaniki pusi oyo ohitio oeuso oyo oapuoo no numa wani sio onanai rerihoni makapana unta. Oapuooi paka otoe isa ereniku numa mamsakae roe naue wani nanae Eder.
Wasomo orueso pan rei, Ruben ineke runa amai sahai Bilha, Rahel ne pina makahaie rei. Taa iatinu san rei oyo Yakup anoi eresaa.
Yakup ne hehuka hanaia sio hutusa rahana ua.
Sio ikina reini oamrae pan otoe Mesopotamia.
Yakup ihokai mai amai Isak. Amai wain iruei mai nia Mamre haineke nia Hebron. Naone momoi iae iruei pan rei.
Isak imatai tau ne musum utuni hutu wanu.
Iamtuai ikore-korei nea. Watipusi nahai, oyo ne hehuka, Esau runa Yakup, uaso okaniki.
Areini mo, Esau nea upu. Esau iae sio oaoiki tau Edom oi.
Esau inana ne pinau tonu arihoni otoe Kanaan. Sio reimo, ia isa nanai Ada. Ada amai tau Elon. Elon ne ipane Het. Sahai isa honu nanai Oholibama. Amai tau Ana. Momoi tau Sibeon. Ia ne ipane Hewi.
Ita sahai isa nanai Basmat. Amai tau Ismael. Hotai tau Hebayot.
Ada isusu Elifas. Basmat isusu Rehuel.
Oholibama isusu Yeus, Yaelam runa Korah. Sio ikina rei pusiso oamrae mai Kanaan.

Taue isa Esau ihitio ieu iarihoni Yakup ieui sui otoe tamene. Ieu ikata ne pina hehuka runa sio wason orueso mai ne numa rei pusiso. Ieu ikatu-katu ne makapanau pusire. Irori ne apia pusire waron isupure mai Kanaan rei.
Esau ieu iarihoni Yakup tau no makapanau no pina hehuka panesi. No makapanau panesi reiso muaina ralaiso tewa nea.
Reiso Esau iruei ria pupua ria otoe Seir.
Areini mo Esau ne hehuka, nea momou, nea upu nanao. Esau mo, ia numa upue tau sio Edom. Sio Edom wason orueso ria pupua ria otoe Seir.
Esau ihitio ieu ria otoe Seir. Seir nea hehuka wason orue tanui nea. Seir nea upu tau Hori.
Esau ihitio ieu ria otoe Seir. Seir nea hehuka wason orue tanui nea. Seir nea upu tau Hori.
Sio numa upua tau sio Hori wason:  Lotan, Syobal, Sibeon, Ana,
Disyon, Eser, runa Disyan.
Sio aiau orime otoe Edom on ia aia isa irime sio Israel tewasi.
Reiso Esau nea upu tau:
Reiso Esau nea upu tau:
Reiso Esau nea upu tau:
Reiso Esau nea upu tau:
Yakup iruei mai otoe wani amai, Isak naone iruei tanui rei. Otoe rei nanae Kanaan.
Areini sahoro sou monae arihoni Yakup ne hehuka.

Yusup ne musum hutusa rahana itu nea reiso iakahai amai. Isaka rompau runa une-uneu iakahai nea kakau. Sio reimo nea kakau wason noa ina tau Bilha runa Silpha. Bilha runa Silpha mo, Yakup ne pinau no makahaia. Reiso isaka ikata nea kakau. Munata osana mo, isima inahu nea kakau rei osi amai.
Yusup iamrae tau amai ikore-korei nea. Reiso amai anoi runai mainae erenesi nea kakau. Oyo iaisosi sio umau ohoni Yusup ne papi naue isa wani marainie.
Nea kakau onoo ata noa ama anoi runa Yusup erenesi sio. Reiso anoo rasaa tau Yusup. Openeso tanui rotu-tu oanamana ia-ia runai tewa nea.
Taue isa tau pumono Yusup inekei iamnii. Ne niine rei iruniki osi nea kakau.
Yusup iasau osiso, “Masi oatinu we niine rei. Monosi uneke uamnii
ita pusita noi nisi ikanihoo manei (manei nooi sani ana) oyo we manei kamanunne ereoo katopu. Ne omi mo manei kamanunna rahori we manei kamanunne. Rahoriki oyo rahahue mai tanui.”
Oyo nea kakau oasau osiki. Oahata, “Ano nanie auna aia tau ami? Ano nanie akawasa tau ami si?” Reiso anoo rasaa mainae tau ne niine na ne anamanaya rai.
Ita ineke iamnii honu. Oyo iruniki osi nea kakau. Iahata, “Uneke uamnii honu. Unoo ranie, hunane, runa oneu hutusa rahana osa ohahue mai tanuku.”
Niine rei iae, iruniki osi amai oi. Ne amai iatinu oyo iakapuku tanui. Iahata, “Me niine sae rei? Ata kani au, inam, runa mea kakau pusima mka ahahue mai tanua si?”
Nea kakau oananai. Ne amai iari-arinii niine rei.
Taue isa Yusup nea kakau wason osaka amai ne rompau runa ne une-uneu haineke nia Sikhem. Osakare na raai monota sui otoe rei.
Reiso Yakup iasau osi Yusup iahata, “Yusup. Masi aeua ria Sikhem, ria mea kakau. Wasora osaka re rompau runa re une-uneu.” Oyo Yusup isana, “Iake, ama.”
Iahata, “Masi anoo mea kakau runa re rompau runa une-uneu ata kani iake te tewa. Na nuni mai asima osiku.”
Reiso iaisosi Yusup ieu iarihoni Ekote Hebron. Oyo ieu rotu-tu ihokai ria Sikhem.
Hoka ria oyo ieu suru ria suru nau sui otoe huie wani nene monota panesi. Isupu ia hanaie isa. Oyo ia hanaie rei iasei tanui, “He. Anina sae rei?”
Iahata, “Ama. Unina wea kakau wason osaka rompau runa une-uneu. Ama anooso? Munata anooso, asima osiku ee.”
Iahata, “Oeuso oarihoni reini nea. Tewa mo, uatinu oasau oahata, ‘Mai na ieuta iarihoni reini na ieuta poe nia Dotan.’”
Oyo Yusup ieu ipusu nea kakau. Isupuso poe Dotan.
Waini on pan hainau asi, ne nea kakau onooi nea. Ne ihainekeso tewasi oimo pusiso oasau osi umau, “Mai na ihunui.
Ia wain ineke iamnii sui osa rei ihokai nea.
Mai, ihunui na ipesiki poe parike anoe mai oto huie reini na iasau, iahata, ‘Binatang seae erehunui nea.’ Na inoo sapani na ne niineu rai.”
Noa kaka Ruben iatinu ata nanie ohunui reiso nanie iapuheui. Iapuheui arihoni nea waniu. Iahata, “Pene ohunui.
Ne mai, na ipesiki na poe parike anoe mai otoe huie man. Pene ihitai.” Iasau san rei tau nanie iapuheui arihoni nea waniu na inuni roriki pan amai.
Mato ihokai mai nea kakau asi oimo, onosu ne papi naue wani marainie rei.
Onosui oyo ohetei. Ohetei oyo opesiki na poe parike anoe wani huie rei.

Opesiki poe parike anoe oyo orue poe, nanie oaiso. Ohetu uao anoa oyo osira tau sio tikana sio arihoni Ismael nea upu ohokaso on pan otoe Gilead. Ohokaso runa no unta waron rapunia kamane, hau rihua, runa ai unte. Nanie oeuso oahenre poe otoe Mesir. (Unta mo, makapana wani nene totue nene sonota pupua.)
Oyo Yehuda iasau osi nea kakau nea waniu. Iahata, “Nanie ihunui iauhuniki taa hae? Ne, mai na iaheniki na isupu re kepen umau.
Iaheniki osi sio Ismael reipa. Ne pene ihunui. Pene ihitai. Ia mo rea wani. Ita ruari re nasi.”
Nea kakau nea waniu oatinu tau ne anamanae rei.

Reiso sio manaheniu on pan otoe Midian arihoni Ismael nea upu nanie oniku oyo ooiso mai. Hoka mai oyo ohoka noa wani arihoni parike anoe rei. Ohokai oyo oaheniki osi sio Ismael rei tau kepen inata hutu ua.
Oyo orori Yusup na poe Mesir.
Sinasi oahen Yusup, Ruben tutui tewa. Ihokai mai, oimo inoo poe parike anoe Yusup tutui tewa nea. Iatamisiki. Reiso ikiha ruai ne papite.
Oyo ieu pan nea waniu iasei, “Ia ikine reimo wain tewa nea. Kani umunaku?”
Oyo onana Yusup ne papi naue wani marainie rei. Onanai oyo ohunu une-une isa samatoro okusa une-une nasie tau ne papite rei.
Oyo orori papite rei osi noa ama samatoro oasau, oahata, “Papite rei, ami asupui. Masi ationa, areimo anamu hanaie ne papite te tewa?”
Oyo iationa papite rei. Iasau ata, “Ira oe! Titue. Reini mo anaku hanaie ne papite rei, tea? Binatang seae ereaiki nea, tea?. Ira oe. Yusup imatai nea tea?”
Reiso ikiha ne papite. Iatamisiki reiso ikihai. Oyo iausahu karuni wani sani karuni nione rei. Iausahui na sio oanei ata iatamisi anai hanaie. Iatamisi anai hanaie rei ro-rotu-tu potuina.
Ne, ne hehuka hanaia, ne mananua, runa anai pina pusiso ohoka mai tanui. Oaunaui san rei, “Ama. Pene arani kuru. Imatai nea, tea? Kani arani ata mka inuniki mai tanua honu?”
Ne ipenei iatinu tau sio no anamanaya rai. Iahata, “Rotu-tu umataku iae, urani runa anaku hanaie sirinia. Urani rotu-tu usipuku poe tanui poe tuniai matane.”
Reiso irani sirinia noso anai hanaie Yusup.
Ne poe Mesir sio Midian rei oahen Yusup osi Potifar. Potifar ia mamsaka aia. Sio Mesir ooi no aiau tau Piraun. Ia mamsakae rei, ia kapitane tau sio mamsaka Piraun ne numa onate.
Nene muie rei Yehuda ihitio ieui iarihoni nea kakau nea waniu oyo iruei ikata ia hanaie isa arihoni nia Adulam. Ia hanaie reimo, nanai Hira.
Mai niane rei Yehuda inoo ia pina hehu Kanaan isa. Ia pina rei amai nanai Sua. Uaso onana umau.
Oyo sahai tinain taua. Iruei runa anai hanaie manaonete ohete nanai tau Er.
Ita sahai tinain taua honu. Iruei runa anai hanaie isa honu. Ohete nanai tau Onan.
Ita tinain taua honu. Iruei runa anai hanaie isa honu. Ohete nanai tau Syela. Ne Syela iamrae rei Yehuda waira nia Kesib.
Er ia mainae nea oyo amai inina sahai isa wain nanai Tamar.
Anahatana inoo Er ne kahatena panesi reiso ihunui.
Er imatai nea reiso amai iasau osi anai hanaie autihue. Iahata, “Onan. Aeu poe kakamu pina na ananai. Kahurae ananai na aneke runai. Me hehuka rei tau kakamu nanai.”
Ianei ata mka ne hehuka rei osi ia ruai tewa reiso inekei ikata sahai ne ipenei tau iunai tinain taua. Inekei ikatai sui osa ne ipenei tau iunai tinain taua reiso Onan iohui poe tuamane.
Ipenei iunai tinain taua reiso Anahatana iapasanai reiso imatai.

Imatai reiso Yehuda iasau osi ne mananue, Tamar. Iahata, “Anunia poe me numa. Aruea poe inam runa amam tau ano uhanu nea. Aruea poe inam runa amam sio rotu-tu Syela ia mainae samatoro uamo onana umau.” Iasau san rei tau ikaitau pene rotu-tu Anahatana ihunu Syela sani ihunu nea kakau uaso rei. Amai, Yehuda iaisosiki san rei, reiso Tamar inuniki poe inai runa amai.

Kani nene musum isa san rei ereniku oyo Yehuda sahai imatai. Sahai mo, Sua anai pina rei. Iatamisi sahai suka oyo Yehuda runa ne neta isa oeuso roe nia Timna roe sio wason oatori rompau nene hunua. Ne neta rei nanai Hira. Ia arihoni nia Adulam.
Sio osima osi Tamar oahata, “Amamu tanaite wain ihokai. Nanie ieui roe Timna na nanie iatori ne rompau nene hunua.”

Iatinu san rei reiso inosu ne papi uhanu rei oyo iausahu papi wani erenete uai anoe pusiki. Inete uai anoe pusi samatoro iruei haineke niane rei nene mitanunue. Niane rei nanae Enaim. Niane rei erehaineke arena wani nanie ereeu roe Timna. Iuna san rei tau ianei ata anai hanaie Syela ia mainae nea ne amai irui uaso oausahaso tewasi.
Reiso Tamar iruei mai mitanunue oyo amai inooi iahata kani ia pina numa naue wain iahen ruai. Tewa mo, inete uai anoe.
Inooi oyo ieui haineke. Iahata, “Ano ainisi ina na uneke ukataya?” Iationa ne mananue tewa.
Iahata, “Pusu ruam arui, upu.”
Iahata, “Au mka urui me une-une honue isa.”
Iahata, “Iake. Hete sae arui sae isa osiku mai ee. Rotu-tu arui une-une rei osiku samatoro on mai uniki.”
Iahata, “Reiso ainisi sae rei?”
Iahata, “Rui me mamono inate reino mai runa nene awane. Rui me karupae reino wamo akatai reino mai oi.” Mamono inate rei sio ouna siaie tanui na oanei ata Yehuda ne mamono.
Yehuda irui ne apia rai oyo uaso onekeso. Onekeso oyo Tamar tinain taua.
Onekeso pusi oyo Tamar inuniki poe ne numa. Ihoka poe inosu ne papite rei oyo iausahu ne papi uhanu rei honu.

Nene onona inasa nau san rei oyo Yehuda iaisosi ne neta rei. Iaisosi Hira na irori une-une rei na inana ne apia rai. Inana ne mamono inate runa karupae waron naone iruire rai. Ne Hira isupu ia pina rei tewa nea.
Reiso iasei suru ria suru nau tau sio poe Enaim. Iahata, “Ia pina numa naue wain iruei inapa mai arena nusue rei wainpa?”
Sio oahata, “Ia pina numa naue isa mai rei tewa.”
Reiso inuniki pan, iasau osi Yehuda san rei, “Au usupu ia pina rei tewa. Sio poe niane rei iae, oasau ata ia pina numa naue isa poe rei tewa.”
Iahata, “Apia rai ruaya osiki man nea, tea? Hete sae ita pene ihana kaumaate rei. Unina nanie usenu, ne aninai nea ne asupui tewa.”
Reiso nene hunana tonu nau san rei oyo sio oasau osi Yehuda oahata, “Me mananue iuna ruai sani ia pina numa naue reiso waipo tinain taua nea.”
Iahata, “Onana ia pina rei mai na iakanupui na imatai arihoni tuniai nea.”
Taa Tamar ihokai arihoni numa oyo iaunau osi amai. Iahata, “Tinaiku taua rei tau ia hanaie wain ne apia rai. Arinii kani ia seia ne apia rai?”

Yehuda iationa ne apia rai. Iahata, “Ia pina reimo isana tewa. Au sahoro usana. Uahata nanie inuniki poe ne mansia mainaya inapa-napa Syela rotu-tu ia mainae samatoro uaso onana umau. Ne urui uaso onana umau sani uasau rei tewa. Reiso au sahoro usana.”
Yehuda ineke-neke runa Tamar tewa nea.
Tamar iruei runa anai hanaie rei poe sira tau sio iki lalekau.
Pannuhu uaso nanie oamrae rei ia ikine isa ihoka hanai atue naone. Ia pina ona pian ikanihoo ia ikine wain hanai atue erehokai naone rei tau pola msinae. Iahata, “Ia ikine rei sahoro ihokai naone.”

Ne ia ikine rei isaru hanai atue honu reiso ia ikine isa iamraeki naone. Ia pina ona pian iahata, “Reiso ano arapu nanie ahokaya san rei si?” Reiso ohete ia ikine rei nanai tau Peres. Peres nene manariti “ihokai naone”.
Ihokai samatoro ia ikine wain ikanihoo hanai atue tau pola msinae rei ihokai. Ohete nanai tau Serah. Serah nene manariti, “Msinae”.
Reiso sio Ismael noa upu orori Yusup poe otoe Mesir oaheniki osi Potifar rei.
Ne Anahatana ikata runa Yusup reiso ne pakarian pusire raeu iake. Iahesa tau sae isa tewa. Iruei poe upui ne numa. Upui, reimo Potifar.
Potifar ianei ata Anahatana ikata runa Yusup. Ianei ata Anahatana iakahaiki na ne pakarian raeu iake.
Potifar anoi iake tau Yusup reiso ihitiki tau hanai wanane. Irui kawasa osiki na isaka ne numa hutae pusiki. Isaka ne sae man.
Ihitiki oyo Anahatana irui iake osi Potifar ne numa hutae. Irui iake osi ne sae man. Masike mai numa runa noi ne nisiu iae, irui iake osiki. Yusup tutui reiso Anahatana irui iake osi Potifar.
Potifar iparisaa tau Yusup reiso irui kawasa osiki na isaka ne sae man. Reiso Potifar anoi erenoa runa sae isa tewa nea. Anoi erenoa runa ne muaine man.
Yusup mo, ia hehu iake. Ne patane maka-makae.
Reiso taue isa, Potifar sahai iasu-asumata Yusup. Oyo iasau osiki, “Mai na uata ineketa.”
Ne Yusup ipenei inekei runai. Iahata, “Au upeneku. Upuku Potifar iparisaa tanuku tau ne sae man. Anoi erenoa runa sae isa mai numa anoe reini tewa nea.
Mai numa reini mo, we kawasa mainae. Sani upuku Potifar oi. Iparisaa pusire osiku nea. Hasae ano sahoro tewa. Sapan na nanie una kahatene san rei na upalalosa tau Anahatana?”
Masike san rei iae, Potifar sahai iapamanui iae, ne ipenei ineke ikatai. Iapamanui sui osa, ne ipenei sirinia.
Tau ranie hatae isa Yusup inusui pan numa anoe nanie ipakarian. Ia osa-sa man nooi pan numa anoe rei tewa. Numa rei huie nai osa.
Potifar sahai inesa tau ne papite iasau iahata, “Mai na uata ineketa.”
Ne ikoka ruai oyo ikasu heu ruai. Ikasu heu ruai oyo irumai. Ne, ne papite wamo ia pina rei ikatai.
Ia pina rei inoo ata Yusup irumai ne, ne papite wani hanai atue

reiso ioi iakapona sio numa anoe rei. Ioiso oyo iasau iahata, “Masi onoo. Ia Ibrani rei wain sahaku iroriki mai numa reini iakarotata. Inusui pan we kakaranae anoe nanie ineke runaku. Ne uakapona kuati.
Iatinu au uakapona kuati oyo irumai, ne iarihoni ne papite mai nusuku.”
Reiso Potifar sahai ikata Yusup ne papite rei erenapa sahai inuniki.
Sahai inuniki samatoro isima nahu Yusup osiki. Iahata, “Ia Ibrani wain aroriki mai rei, reimo inusui mai re kakaranae nanie ineke runaku.
Ne uakapona runai reiso irumai iarihoni ne papite mai nusuku.”
Iatinu san rei oyo anoi eresaa mainae.
